name: Wooden Arrow
description: An arrow made of wood. It is an arrow that is used for a 0 grade bow.

name: Wooden Breastplate
description: When worn with Wooden Gaiters and Wooden Helmet, P. Def. will increase by 2% and maximum HP will increase by 41.

name: Mithril Breastplate
description: When worn with Mithril Gaiters and Mithril Helmet, chances of being poisoned will decrease by 20%. If one wears Hoplon as well, maximum HP will increase by 126. Effect 13.

name: Composite Armor
description: Armor consisting of upper and lower garments. When worn with a Composite Helmet, the weight limit will increase by 5795. If one is equipped with a Composite Shield as well, M. Def. will increase by 5%.

description: Bestows either Critical Drain, Critical Poison or Rsk. Haste.

description: Bestows either Guidance, Evasion or Miser.

name: Widow Maker
description: Bestows either Critical Stun, Lunging Strike or Sweeping Strike.

name: Brigandine Tunic
description: When worn with Brigandine Gaiters and Brigandine Helmet, P. Def. will increase by 5% and maximum HP will increase by 153. If one is equipped with a Brigandine Shield as well, maximum HP will increase by 20.

name: Chain Mail Shirt
description: When worn with Chain Gaiters and Chain Hood, P. Def. against a dagger attack will increase by 5%. If one is equipped with a Chain Shield as well, maximum HP will increase by 198.

name: Full Plate Armor
description: Armor consisting of upper and lower garments. When worn with Full Plate Helmet, maximum HP will increase by 270. If one is equipped with a Full Plate Shield as well, shield defense rate will increase by 5%.

name: Zubei's Breastplate
description: When worn with Zubei's Gaiters, Zubei's Helmet, Zubei's Gauntlets and Zubei's Boots, P. Def. will increase by 5% and maximum HP will increase by 294.

name: Blue Wolf Breastplate
description: When worn with Blue Wolf Gaiters, Blue Wolf Helmet, Blue Wolf Gloves and Blue Wolf Boots, increases Speed by 7 and HP recovery speed by 5%. Generates STR +3, CON -1, and DEX -2 .

name: Armor of Nightmare
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Reinforced Leather Shirt
description: When worn with Reinforced Leather Gaiters and Reinforced Leather Boots, maximum MP will increase by 80.

name: Manticore Skin Shirt
description: When worn with Manticore Skin Gaiters and Manticore Skin Boots, maximum MP will increase by 92.

name: Salamander Skin Mail
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Mithril Shirt
description: When worn with Tempered Mithril Gaiters and Mithril Boots, maximum MP will increase by 4.

name: Plated Leather
description: When worn with Plated Leather Gaiters and Plated Leather Boots, generates STR +4 and CON -1.

name: Theca Leather Armor
description: When worn with Theca Leather Gaiters and Theca Leather Boots P. Def. will increase by 5%.

name: Drake Leather Armor
description: Armor consisting of upper and lower garments. When worn with Drake Leather Boots, M. Def will increase by 5%.

name: Dragon Leather Armor
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Cotton Robe
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Robe of Devotion
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Robe of Magic
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Tunic of Knowledge
description: When worn with Stockings of Knowledge and Gloves of Knowledge, M. Def. will increase by 10% and MP recovery speed will decrease by 5%.

name: Mithril Tunic
description: When worn with Mithril Stockings and Elven Mithril Gloves, speed will increase by 7, WIT will increase by 1 and INT will decrease by 1.

name: Sage's Rag
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Karmian Tunic
description: When worn with Karmian Stockings and Karmian Gloves, increases P. Def. by 5% and Casting Spd. by 15%.

name: Robe of Seal
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Demon's Tunic
description: When worn with Demon's Stockings and Demon's Gloves, maximum HP will decrease by 270, INT will increase by 4 and WIT will decrease by 1.

name: Divine Tunic
description: When worn with Divine Stockings and Divine Gloves, P. Def. will increase by 5%, maximum MP will increase by 171, INT will decrease by 1 and WIT will increase by 1.

name: Sage's Robe
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Robe of Black Ore
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Otherworldly Robe
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Robe of Holy Spirit
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: The Robe
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Chair
description: Chair

name: Darin's Letter
description: The love letter that Daring has written to Rapunzel. Daring has asked the player to deliver this letter to Gatekeeper Rapunzel.

name: Roxxy's Kerchief
description: Rapunzel's handkerchief. This is the reply that Rapunzel has given to Daring's letter, and must be delivered to Daring.

name: Poetry Book
description: A poetry book treasured by Arujien. The book contains poems that he has penned. Take this to Greenis.

name: Lyrics Book
description: A description of the lyrics book of Herbtien

name: Romance Novel
description: A description of the romance novel

name: Arujien's Letter
description: A description of Arujien's letter

name: Greenis's Letter
description: Greenis' letter, refusing Arujien's love. Take this to Arujien.

name: Talos List
description: A list of ingredients: Three Onyx Beasts' Blood, two Nana Vampires' Husks, two Gargoyles' Horns

name: Omen Beast's Blood
description: A description of Onyxof Onyxof Onyx Beast's Blood

name: Mana Seeker's Husk
description: A description of Mana Vampire's Husk

name: Gargoyle's Horn
description: A description of a Gargoyle's Horn

name: Gilbert's List
description: A list of things to eliminate: orcs, hobgoblins, walking fungus

name: Orc's Nose
description: A description of an Orc's Nose

name: Hobgoblin Amulet
description: A description of Hobgoblin's Amulet

name: Fungus Juice
description: A description of Fungus Juice

name: Wolf Pelt
description: Gather forty wolf pelts and take them to Trader Lector of the weapons and armor shop.

name: Poison Sac
description: Poison sacs obtained from the dead giant spider. Take this to Priest Yohanes.

name: Fever Medicine
description: A medicine concocted by Priest Yohanes for the students who are ill with fever. Take this to Elrias.

name: Orc's Amulet
description: A description of an Orc feather amulet

name: Basilisk's Claw
description: A description of Basilisk's Claw

name: Fungus Sac
description: A spore sac obtained from the fungus. Gather 10 of these and take them to Trader Vollodos.

name: Sylph Headband
description: A description of Sylph Headband

name: Healing Drug
description: A magical, liquid medicine that restores HP for a certain amount of time

name: Mana Drug
description: A magical, liquid medicine that restores MP for a certain amount of time

name: Healing Potion
description: A magical, liquid medicine that restores HP for a certain amount of time

name: Mana Potion
description: A magical, liquid medicine that restores MP for a certain amount of time

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade A)
description: Increases an A grade weapon's P. Atk. by  4, and from +4, the P. Atk. will increase by 8. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade A)
description: Increases the P. Def. of an A Grade armor or accessory by 1, and from +4, the P. Def will increase by 3. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. One-piece type armor can be safely enchanted up to +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade A)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers an A Grade weapon

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade A)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers an A Grade armor

name: Endeavor Potion
description: A magical, liquid medicine that increases willpower

name: Haste Potion
description: A magical, liquid medicine that increases speed

name: Potion of Alacrity
description: A description of a liquid medicine that increases attack power

name: Scroll of Escape
description: A scroll of enchantment that relocates the player to the nearest village

name: Scroll of Resurrection
description: A scroll of enchantment that resuscitates a dead person

name: Sword of Solidarity
description: A bronze sword crafted long ago in memory of the union between the Humans and the Elves.

name: Broken Sword Handle
description: The handle portion of the Sword of Solidarity. Take this to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Broken Blade Bottom
description: Take this, and the upper portion of the blade to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Broken Blade Top
description: Take this, and the lower portion of the blade to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Altran's Note
description: A letter requesting the handle of the sword from Roien. Take this to Grandmaster Roien of Cedric's Training Hall.

name: Sword of Sentinel
description: A steel blade issued to those fighters that have been acknowledged as protectors of the woods

name: Staff of Sentinel
description: A staff issued to those magicians that have been acknowledged as protectors of the woods

name: Alberius's List
description: Sentinel Berryos. Sentinel Veltress. Sentinel Rayjien. Deliver this medicine to Sentinel Gartrandell.

name: Wand of Adept
description: The wand presented to those who have finished their studies at the school of magic

name: Gallin's Oak Wand
description: An oak wand enchanted by Gallint's spell. This will capture and seal the spirit of mirrors.

name: Orc Amulet
description: An amulet that the Orcs carry for magical purposes. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

name: Red Sunset Staff
description: A staff used by warriors belonging to the Red Sunset clan

name: Roien's Letter
description: A letter on which Roien summarized the historical information related to the Sword of Solidarity. Take this to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Bone Fragment
description: Bone fragments obtained from the undead skeletons. Collect ten of these and take to Tetrarch Kaitar.

name: Ring of Knowledge
description: A gold ring with delicately engraved rune characters of knowledge

name: Ring of Anguish
description: A gold ring with engraved rune characters of anguish

name: Necklace of Knowledge
description: A silver necklace engraved with rune characters of knowledge

name: Necklace of Anguish
description: A silver necklace engraved with rune characters of anguish

name: Directions to Ruins
description: Follow the northwestern path from the village, and head west when you meet the War Victory Tower. The entrance to the ruins lies at the slope of the mountain.

name: Skeleton Buckler
description: A small wooden shield that perpetrators of mages use

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade B)
description: Increases a B grade weapon's P. Atk. by 3, and from +4, the P. Atk. will increase by 6. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade B)
description: Increases P. Def. of a B grade armor or accessory by 1, and from +4, the P. Def will increase by 3. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. One-piece type armor can be safely enchanted up to +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade B)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a B Grade weapon

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade B)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a B Grade armor

description: Increases a C grade weapon's P. Atk. by 3, and from +4, the P. Atk. will increase by 6. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

description: Increases P. Def. of a C grade armor or accessory by 1, and from +4, the P. Def will increase by 3. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. One-piece type armor can be safely enchanted up to +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade C)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a C Grade weapon

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade C)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a C Grade armor

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade D)
description: Increases a D grade weapon's P. Atk. by 2, and from +4, the P. Atk. will increase by 4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade D)
description: Increases P. Def. of a D grade armor or accessory by 1, and from +4, the P. Def will increase by 3. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. One-piece type armor can be safely enchanted up to +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade D)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a D Grade weapon

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade D)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a D Grade armor

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade S)
description: Increases a S grade weapon's P. Atk. by 5, and from +4, the P. Atk. will increase by 10. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade S)
description: Increases P. Def. of a S grade armor or accessory by 1, and from +4, the P. Def will increase by 3. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. One-piece type armor can be safely enchanted up to +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade S)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a S Grade weapon

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade S)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a S Grade armor

name: Orcish Arrowhead
description: An arrowhead that Lennunt orcs use on Talking Island. Collect these and take to Master Minia.

name: Alberius's Letter
description: A letter from Alberryus. Take this to Master Cobendell.

name: Evergreen Amulet
description: A necklace set with a green elemental stone. The player must possess this to slay the dryad and obtain the dryad's tears.

name: Dryad's Tears
description: A jewel that contains the essence of a dryad's soul. Gather ten of these and take them to Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell Medicine
description: A description of Cobendell's medicine

name: Karrod's Letter
description: The letter written by Blacksmith Karoyd. Take this to the abyssal celebrant Cecktinon in the temple of Shilen.

name: Cecktinon's First Voucher
description: An introduction letter from the abyssal celebrant Cecktinon. Take this and seek Magister Herne in the village.

name: Cecktinon's Second Voucher
description: An introduction letter from the abyssal celebrant Cecktinon. Go to the School of Dark Arts, hunt skeletons, and gather 10 bone fragments.

name: Soul Catcher
description: An item used during the exorcism ritual to call upon a spirit of the dead. Take this to the abyssal celebrant Cecktinon.

name: Preserving Oil
description: An oil that when used, prevents the rotting of corpses. Take this and go hunt zombies in the swamps.

name: Zombie Head
description: The head of tree Elf zombies that have been cut after they are defeated. Take this to the abyssal celebrant Cecktinon.

name: Steelbender Head
description: ... hey! Don’t take me to that bad-tempered blacksmith, please...!

name: Blood Saber
description: An orihalcon sword crafted in the Abella style of the east

name: Mark of Sentinel1
description: A mark that certifies that its bearer is an Elven Sentinel. Destroy an orc Tanuki skullcrusher and report to Sentinel Kendell.

name: Mark of Sentinel2
description: A mark that certifies that its bearer is an Elven Sentinel. Destroy an orc Bhato bloodspear and report to Sentinel Kendell.

name: Skullcrusher Amulet
description: The amulet that represents the Skullcrusher Orc tribe. Take this to Sentinel Kendnell.

name: Bloodspear Amulet
description: The amulet that represents the Bloodspear Orc tribe. Take this to Sentinel Kendnell.

name: Red Sunset Sword
description: A sword used by warriors belonging to the Red Sunset clan

name: Esrandell's Letter
description: A description of Esrandell's introduction

name: Kendell's Letter
description: A description of Kendnell's letter

name: Onyx Talisman 1
description: A necklace crafted of onyx. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: Onyx Talisman 2
description: A necklace crafted of onyx. Recover the original scrolls from the blackskull Orcs and bring them to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia..

name: Ancient Scroll
description: An ancient scroll called Kaysha's Revelation. Take it along with the clay tablet to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: Ancient Clay Tablet
description: An ancient clay tablet engraved with text. Take it along with the ancient scroll to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: Karta's Translation
description: The Karta's translation of Kaysha's Revelations. Take it to Tetrarch Thifiell.

name: Eldritch Dagger
description: A steel dagger engraved with the runes of Shilen and Gran Kain

name: Harrys's Receipt 1
description: A receipt Harris received after ordering tools. Take this and go to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Harrys's Receipt 2
description: The receipt that Harris has received after placing an order for his tools. Go and gather golem shards needed for creating the tool.

name: Golem Shard
description: Shards of rock that have fallen from the golem's body. Gather five of these and take them to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Tool Box
description: A toolbox containing the tools that Blacksmith Alltran has forged. Take this to Magister Harris at the temple.

name: Delivery List
description: Take the heavy wooden box to Trader Jackson. The bolts of cloth to Trader Silvia. Take the clay pot to the warehouse keeper Rant.

name: Heavy Wood Box
description: The wooden box to be delivered to Trader Jackson of the weapons shop.

name: Cloth Bundle
description: Bolts of cloth that need to be delivered to Trader Silvia of the grocery store.

name: Clay Pot
description: The clay pot that must be delivered to the warehouse keeper Rant.

name: Jackson's Receipt
description: The receipt that Jackson has issued upon receiving his wooden box. Take this to Guard Arnold.

name: Silvia's Receipt
description: The receipt that Silvia has issued upon receiving her bolts of cloth. Take this to Guard Arnold.

name: Rant's Receipt
description: The receipt issued by Rant upon his receiving of the clay pot. Take this to Guard Arnold.

name: official Letter
description: An official letter that the Lord of Gludio has sent to Sir Colin Windawood, calling a meeting. Deliver this to Sir Windawood.

name: Flame Shard
description: A fragment of elemental stone of fire. Can be taken from the fire spirit Salamander. Give to Trader Katrine.

name: Ice Shard
description: A fragment of elemental stone of water. Can be taken from the water spirit Undine. Give to Trader Katrine.

name: Lilith's Letter
description: A letter written by Rylith in longing for her lover, separated a thousand years ago. Find out news about her lover for her.

name: Theon's Diary
description: A diary written by Theon in longing for his lover, separated a thousand years ago. Take this to Rylith.

name: Adamantite Ore
description: Adamantite ore. All of it is imported from Gracia. Gather 20 of these and take them to Gatekeeper Wilphrod.

name: Clay Tablet
description: A tablet praising Beleth that the Devil Nerkas possessed. Deliver this to High Priest Biotin.

name: Silvery Spidersilk
description: The spider silk of the silver spider. Take this to Trader Unoren of the weapons shop.

name: Uno's Receipt
description: The receipt issued by the magic shop. Take this and go to Trader Creamees.

name: Cel's Ticket
description: A ticket issued by the warehouse. Take this and go to Warehouse Keeper Juria.

name: Nightshade Leaf
description: The leaf of the nightshade plant. Take this to Nerupa.

name: Cracked Skull
description: The cracked skull of the Dark Horror. Take this to Magister Vlasty.

name: Perfect Skull
description: Skull of the Dark Horror. Take this to Magister Vlasty.

name: Fox Fur
description: A mane of Keltirs. It is soft and luxurious, and used to spin thread and yarn. Take this to Cristel.

name: Fox Fur Yarn
description: Yarn spun out of the fur of Keltirs. Take this to the former tailor Warehouse Keeper Rolfe, and he will make it into the doll's hair.

name: Maiden Doll
description: A doll resembling a Human maiden. Take this to Lighthouse Keeper Rockswell.

name: Plague Dust
description: A powder obtained from the plague zombie. Take this to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Andellia's Letter
description: A letter written by Andellrias to her sister Thalya, asking her to send the fruit of the Mothertree.

name: Fruit of The Mother Tree
description: Fruit that the Mothertree bears once every few years. Take this to Andellria.

name: Rumiel's Poem 1
description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's first poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Stardyen.

name: Rumiel's Poem 3
description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's third poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Stardyen.

name: Rumiel's Poem 4
description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's fourth poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Stardyen.

name: Rumiel's Poem 5
description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's fifth poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Stardyen.

name: Wererat's Fang
description: The fang of a dead ratman. Collect these to take to Master Ellenia.

name: Varool Foulclaw's Fang
description: The fang of Varool Foulclaw, leader of the ratmen. Take this to Master Ellenia.

name: Kirunak Skull
description: Kirunak's skull obtained after killing Kirunak, the leader of the drevanuls. Take this to Trader Creamees.

name: Zombie's Skin
description: A skin obtained from marshland zombies. Collect five and go to Trader Minaless.

name: Nightmare Crystal
description: A crystal used by the succubus Merkenis to cast nightmares. Take this to Tetrarch Vellior.

name: Spellbook: Light
description: Spellbook required for Light magic.

name: Spellbook: Might
description: Spellbook required for Light magic. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Ice Bolt
description: Spellbook required for Light magic. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Battle Heal
description: Spellbook required for Battle Heal magic. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Vampiric Touch
description: Spellbook required for Vampiric Touch magic. Used by Human Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Flame Strike
description: Spellbook required for Flame Strike magic. Used by Human Wizards, Elven Wizards and Dark Wizards.

name: Spellbook: Cure Poison
description: Spellbook required for Cure Poison magic. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Group Heal
description: Spellbook required for Group Heal magic. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Curse: Poison
description: Spellbook required for Curse Poison magic. Used by Human Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Curse: Weakness
description: Spellbook required for Curse Weakness magic. Used by Human Mystics and Elven Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Summon Meal
description: Spellbook required for Summon Meal magic. Used by Human Mystics and Elven Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Shield
description: Spellbook required for Shield magic. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Know Enemy
description: Spellbook required for Know Enemy magic.

name: Lesser Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that slowly restores HP. Low endurance.

name: Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that slowly restores HP. High endurance.

name: Haste Potion
description: A magical potion that increases the speed

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial parchment to Grandmaster Roien

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial parchment to Grandmaster Roien

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial parchment to Nerupa

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial parchment to Mitraell, the chief of Brown Elves

name: Recommendation
description: Take the recommendation to Grandmaster Roien

name: Recommendation
description: Take the recommendation to Grandmagister Gallint

name: Leaf of The Mother Tree
description: Take the leaf of the Mothertree to Nerupa.

name: Blood of Mitraell
description: Take the blood of Mitraell to Chief Mitraell.

name: Hyacinth Charm
description: A charm given by Hierarch Asterios. Go to the water source to seek those who pollute the waters of the elven village.

name: Hyacinth Charm
description: A charm given by Hierarch Asterios. Go to the water source and obtain five handfuls of plague dust from the zombies.

name: Beginner's Potion
description: A magical potion that slowly restores HP. Low endurance.

name: Boat Ticket: Talking Island to Gludio
description: Boat Ticket: Depart Talking Island - Arrive Gludin Harbor

name: Boat Ticket: Gludio to Talking Island
description: Boat Ticket: Depart Gludin Harbor - Arrive Talking Island

name: Collette's Letter
description: First half year financial summary of the Steel Gate guild: balance sheet and profit and loss statement of the Dark Elven Village guild.

name: Venom Sac
description: A poison sac of poisonous spider. Gather ten of these and take to Astaron.

name: Wind Shard
description: A fragment of the elemental stone of wind. You can get them from Lirein, the wind spirits. Collect these to take to Rizraell.

name: Darin's Receipt
description: A receipt for a magical potion Daring received after paying Baulro. This must be handed to Baulro.

name: Baulro's Potion
description: A potion of courage that Baulro has created for the shy Daring. But effects are unknown. This must be delivered to Daring.

name: Omen Beast's Eye
description: The first of three materials Tetrarch Talloth asked you to collect.

name: Taint Stone
description: The second of three materials Tetrarch Talloth asked you to collect.

name: Succubus Blood
description: The third of three materials Tetrarch Talloth asked you to collect.

name: Gludio Lord's Mark
description: A mark indicating that the bearer is carrying out the orders of the lord. Keep this in your possession and hunt Orcs or werewolves.

name: Orc's Necklace
description: A bone necklace that Orc fighters possess on their bodies for magic purposes. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

name: Werewolf's Fang
description: Fangs from a dead werewolf. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

name: Giant Spider's Leg
description: The legs cut off from a giant spider. Collect eight of these and take them to Alshupes.

name: Undrias's Letter
description: Abyssal Celebrant Undrias' letter. Take this letter to Trader Iria, Warehouse Keeper Dorankus, and Master Trudy.

name: Ceremonial Dagger
description: A ceremonial dagger used during the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

name: Dreviant Wine
description: Holy wine used in the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

name: Garmiel's Scripture
description: The scripture used during the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

name: Arujien's Letter
description: The letter that Arujien has written in longing for Greenis. Show this to Gatekeeper Mintiel.

name: Arujien's Letter
description: The letter that Arujien has written in longing for Greenis. Show this to Trader Herbtien.

name: Arujien's Letter
description: Arujien's love letter. Since the player has shown this to Mintiel and Herbtien, the player must go back to Arujien.

name: Spellbook: Aura Attack
description: Spellbook required for Aura Attack magic. Used by Elven Fighters and Dark Fighters.

name: Spellbook: Elemental Heal
description: Spellbook required for Elemental Heal magic. Used by Elven Fighters.

name: Spellbook: Drain Health
description: Spellbook required for Drain Health magic. Used by Human Knights and Dark Fighters.

name: Spellbook: Wind Walk
description: Spellbook required for Wind Walk magic. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.

name: Spellbook: Wind Shackle
description: Spellbook required for Wind Shackle magic. Used by Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Cotton Tunic
description: A tunic made of tough cotton

name: Tunic of Devotion
description: When worn with Stockings of Devotion and Leather Helmet, Casting Spd. will increase by 15%.

name: Tunic of Magic
description: A tunic, comfortably designed for mages

name: Cotton Stockings
description: A pair of pants made of tough cotton

name: Stockings of Devotion
description: A pair of pants with rune characters of mana, embroidered with silk thread

name: Stockings of Magic
description: A pair of pants, comfortably designed for mages

name: Norman's Letter
description: First half year financial summary of the Steel Gate guild: balance sheet and profit and loss statement of the Gludio region guild.

name: Bone Fragment
description: Bone fragments of the undead skeletons. Collect ten of these and go back to Magister Harne.

name: Orc Amulet
description: An amulet possessed by Kaboo Orcs for magic purposes. Take it to Sentinel Rayjien.

name: Orc's Necklace
description: A bone necklace possessed by Kaboo Orc fighters for magic purposes. Take it to Sentinel Rayjien.

name: Orc Amulet
description: An amulet that the balor Orcs possess for magical purposes. Take this to Sentry Kayleen.

name: Orc's Necklace
description: A bone necklace that the balor Orc fighters carry for magical purposes. Take this to Sentry Kayleen.

name: Fungus Sac
description: A sac containing spore pollen. Give 10 spore sacs to Herbtien.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Spiritbound Wand
description: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into the wand and take it to Grandmagister Gallint.

name: Spiritbound Wand
description: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into the wand and take it to Grandmagister Gallint.

name: Spiritbound Wand
description: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into the wand and take it to Grandmagister Gallint.

name: Auron's Letter
description: A letter written by Master Ainus. Take this to Trader Simplon in the Town of Gludio.

name: Warrior Guild Mark
description: A mark that shows that player is a member of the Warrior Guild. Take this to the Ruins of Despair and kill tracker skeletons.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
description: An old bronze sword used by tracker skeletons. Collect ten and give them to Trader Simplon.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
description: An old and rusted bronze sword given by Trader Simplon, who said it was a 'Sword of Trial'.Take this to Master Ainus.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
description: An old and rusty bronze sword called the 'Sword of Trial'. Use this to hunt poison spiders and Trimden.

name: Simplon's Letter
description: A letter written by Trader Simplon. Take this to Master Ainus.

name: Poison Spider's Leg
description: A cut leg of a dead poison spider or a bind poison spider. Collect twenty of these and take to Master Ainus.

name: Medallion of Warrior
description: Take this medallion and go to the grandmaster of the Warrior's Guild to change your occupation to a warrior.

name: Spellbook: Wind Strike
description: Spellbook required for Wind Strike magic.

name: Spellbook: Self Heal
description: Spellbook required for Self Heal magic.

name: Spellbook: Heal
description: Spellbook required for Heal magic. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Jenna's Letter
description: A letter from Sentry Jenine to Master Harant.

name: Sentry Blade
description: An adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

name: Sentry Blade
description: An adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

name: Sentry Blade
description: An adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

name: Old Bronze Sword
description: A bronze sword used in the past by sentries. Recover this and take it to Sentry Jenine.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment obtained from the undead skeletons. Gather ten bone fragments and three Elf skulls, and take them to Unoren.

name: Elf Skull
description: The skull of an undead Elf. Gather ten bone fragments and three Elf skulls, and take them to Unoren.

name: Dark Bezoar
description: Gather 13 dark bezoars and take them to Sentry Nelsya.

name: Sword of Ritual
description: Take this sword to the grandmaster of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a knight.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Gludio Guard's Badge 1
description: A mark that proves a member of the guard. As Captain Bathia requested, conquest bugbear raiders.

name: Bugbear Necklace
description: A necklace worn by bugbears for incantation purposes. Collect ten of these and visit Captain Bathia.

name: Einhasad Temple Badge 1
description: As High Priest Raimund requested, go to the Ruins of Despair, defeat the departed spirits of priests, and collect 12 Einhasad crucifixes.

name: Einhasad Crucifix
description: A holy symbol of Einhasad, the god of light. Collect twelve of these and go to High Priest Raimund.

name: Gludio Guard's Badge 2
description: The mark that distinguishes a member of the Guard. As Captain Bezique requested, conquest giant spiders.

name: Poison Spider Leg 1
description: A severed leg of a dead poison spider. Collect twenty of these and go to Captain Bezique.

name: Einhasad Temple Badge 2
description: As High Priest Levian requested, kill Langk Lizardmen and collect the proof.

name: Lizardman's Totem
description: A small sculpture Langk Lizardmen carry with them. Collect twenty of these and take them to High Priest Levian.

name: Gludio Guard's Badge 3
description: A mark that proves a member of the Guard. As Captain Gilbert requested, hunt giant spiders.

name: Giant Spider's Husk
description: The husk of a giant spider that you peeled off. Collect twenty of these and take them to Captain Gilbert.

name: Einhasad Temple Badge 3
description: As High Priest Biotin requested, hunt Silent Horrors in the elven ruins.

name: Skull of Silent Horror
description: The skull of a long-dead Elf. Collect 10 and take them to High Priest Biotin.

name: Bezique's Letter
description: Captain Bezique's letter to Neti. Find Neti in the Village of Gludin and give her the letter.

name: Neti's Bow
description: A favorite bow used by Neti, who was once a treasure hunter. Use this bow to hunt skeletons and spartoi of the Ruins of Despair and gather bone pieces.

name: Neti's Dagger
description: Once a treasure hunter, Neti now uses the dagger. Take this dagger to hunt skeletons and spartoi in the Ruins of Despair and collect bone pieces.

name: Spartoi's Bones
description: Undead bone pieces. Collect ten and take them to Neti.

name: Horseshoe of Light
description: A proof you received after passing Neti's test. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

name: Most Wanted List
description: It is written that whoever does away with the Cat's Eye bandits and recovers the stolen goods will be rewarded.

name: Stolen Jewelry
description: A fair amount of jewelry the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take them to Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Tomes
description: A rare tome the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Ring
description: An expensive necklace that the Cat's Eye bandits have stolen. You must take it back to Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Necklace
description: An expensive necklace the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

name: Bezique's Recommendation
description: Take this medallion to the grandmasters of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a rogue.

name: Letter of Order 1
description: A certificate of forbidden book collection given by Priest Zigaunt. Carry this around and collect all the forbidden books.

name: Letter of Order 2
description: A certificate that proves that you represent the religious body. This certificate is given by Priest Zigaunt. Take this to Lemoniell for covenant.

name: Lionel's Book
description: The last book of Lemoniell. Hand this book to Grandmagister Gallint in the Einhovant School of Wizardry.

name: Book of Vivyan
description: A forbidden book Simplon sold to Viviante. Collect five forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

name: Book of Simlon
description: The rest of Simplon's forbidden books. Collect five forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

name: Book of Praga
description: A forbidden book Simplon sold to Praga. Collect five forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

name: Certificate of Gallint
description: A certificate that Gallint gives for safekeeping of forbidden books. Give to Lemoniell and receive covenant.

name: Pendant of Mother
description: The pendant of his mother that Guard Praga lost in the ruins. Take this to Guard Praga and receive a forbidden book.

name: Necklace of Mother
description: A necklace chain where a pendant used to hang. Recover the pendant from the zombies in the Ruins of Sorrow to make it complete.

name: Lionel's Covenant
description: Lemoniell's pledge not to use the forbidden book again. Give it to Priest Zigaunt and receive the Mark of Faith.

name: Mark of Faith
description: Take this token to the high priest of the temple to change your occupation to a cleric.

name: Sorius's Letter 1
description: A letter received from Master Sorius to be given to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin.

name: Kluto Box
description: A box that Kluto asked to give to Master Sorius.

name: Elven Knight Brooch
description: Take this brooch to the grandmaster of the Fighter Guild and he will change your occupation to a knight.

name: Topaz Piece
description: A piece of topaz obtained from the undead in the ruins. Collect twenty to take to Master Sorius.

name: Emerald Piece
description: A piece of emerald obtained from the Ol Mahum novices. Collect 20 of these to take to Blacksmith Kluto.

name: Reisa's Letter 2
description: Master Reoria's letter to Guard Moretti. Find Guard Moretti and give him the letter.

name: Prias's Torn Letter 1
description: A torn piece of letter written by Prigun and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Prias's Torn Letter 2
description: A torn piece of letter written by Prigun and is not legible Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Prias's Torn Letter 3
description: A torn piece of letter written by Prigun and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Prias's Torn Letter 4
description: A torn piece of letter written by Prigun and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Moretti's Herb
description: An herb that Guard Moretti asked to give to Prigun

name: Guard's Bow
description: A bow given by Guard Moretti. May be efficiently used for some purpose.

name: Moretti's Letter
description: An urgent letter from Guard Moretti to Prigun

name: Prias's Letter
description: A reply of Prigun to the letter from Guard Moretti. Hand this to Moretti.

name: Honorary Guard
description: A letter written by Guard Moretti to Master Reoria. Take it to Master Reoria.

name: Reisa's Recommendation
description: Take this recommendation to the grandmaster of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to an Elven scout.

name: Rosella's Letter
description: A letter from Rogellia to Elven Magister Greenis. Related to ruby, the symbol of fire.

name: Red Down
description: Material needed to make ruby of magical powers. Collect five and take them to Magister Greenis for Magical Power Ruby.

name: Magical Powers Ruby
description: Ruby that symbolizes fire. Gather four jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rogellia for a token to change occupations.

name: Pure Aquamarine
description: Aquamarine that symbolizes water. Gather the four jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rogellia for a token to change occupations.

name: Appetizing Apple
description: A very ripe apple. Give it to Thalya for information on the aquamarine of water.

name: Gold Leaves
description: Leaves used as fertilizer of the Mothertree. Collect five leaves and give them to Thalya for an aquamarine.

name: Immortal Love
description: A book Northwindel wanted to borrow. If you give this book to Northwindel, you can obtain information on the amethyst.

name: Amethyst
description: An amethyst obtained by killing sukar wererat. Give two to Northwindel for Nobility Amethyst.

name: Nobility Amethyst
description: Amethyst that symbolizes wind. Gather four jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rogellia for a token to change occupations.

name: Rosella's Recommendation
description: Rogellia's recommendation. If you show this to Varsak, you can get information on Fertility Peridot.

name: Peridot
description: A peridot you can get if you kill a sniper skeleton. If you collect three and show them to Varsak, you can get the Fertility Peridot.

name: Fertility Peridot
description: A peridot that symbolizes the earth. Gather four jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rogellia for a token to change occupations.

name: Eternity Diamond
description: Take this token to the grandmaster of the Magician Guild to change your occupation to an Elven wizard.

name: Crystal Medallion
description: A necklace given by Priest Manuell. Take this and go to the port Gludin to find the girl who works miracles.

name: Swindler's Money
description: Money from Perrin's swindling. Give it to Allana.

name: Allana's Diary
description: A diary with records of fraud miracle. Show this to Priest Manuell as proof.

name: Lizard Captain Order
description: An order of lizard captain to kidnap the Sacred Flame of Prophecy.

name: Leaf of Oracle
description: Take this to the high priest to change your occupation to an oracle.

name: Half of Diary
description: Half of the diary given by Allana. You must get money from Perrin and find the other half of the diary.

name: Palus Talisman
description: A talisman inscribed with Palus runes that symbolize a deep lake. Carry this and hunt lycanthrope in the Neutral Zone.

name: Lycanthrope Skull
description: A skull obtained after killing lycanthrope. Collect thirteen and take them to Master Virgil.

name: Virgil's Letter
description: A letter written by Master Virgil. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta of the Village of Gludin.

name: Morte Talisman
description: A talisman with inscription of rune of Morte, symbol of death. Carry this and find materials needed for coffin.

name: Predator's Carapace
description: A large, hard carapace. Take this and five trimden silk threads to abyssal celebrant Kalinta.

name: Trimden Silk
description: Trimden's spider web threads. Take five of these and a giant poison spider carapace to abyssal celebrant Kainta.

name: Coffin of Eternal Rest
description: A coffin used in funeral of Dark elven knight. Take this to Master Virgil.

name: Gaze of Abyss
description: Take this token to the grandmaster of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a knight.

name: Shilen's Call
description: A letter received from Triskel. Go to female shaman Arkenia of the Dark Elf coming-of-age ceremony altar.

name: Arkenia's Letter
description: A letter received from Arkenia. Take this to Guard Leikan to hear about information on thief.

name: Leikan's Note
description: A simple contract given by Guard Leikan. Must hunt moonstone beasts and collect their molars.

name: Omen Beast's Molar
description: A molar obtained after killing a moonstone beast. Collect 10 of these to take to Guard Leikan.

name: Leikan's Knife
description: A knife received as present from Leikan. They say it works well against the Calpicos.

name: Shilen's Tears
description: Magic liquid stolen from Dark Elf coming-of-age ceremony altar. Give this to the female shaman Arkenia.

name: Arkenia's Recommendation
description: A token of thanks received from Arkenia. Take this to Triskel.

name: Iron Heart
description: Take this to the grandmaster of the Dark Elven Guild to change your occupation to an assassin.

name: Seeds of Anger
description: A seed that can be obtained from Charkeren, who is full of anger. Take this to female shaman Varika.

name: Seeds of Despair
description: Seeds of Despair given by female shaman Varika. Must have to earn Jewel of Darkness.

name: Seeds of Horror
description: A seed that can be obtained from Annsery, who is full of horror. Take this to female shaman Varika.

name: Seeds of Lunacy
description: A seed that can be obtained from a lunatic. Take this to female shaman Varika.

name: Family's Ashes
description: Ashes of Charkeren's slain family. Find three and return to Charkeren.

name: Varika's Liquor
description: A medicine Varika made for the son of Duchess Dwell. If you give it to Duchess, you can obtain the seed of despair.

name: Knee Bone
description: The knee bone of undead that Annsery was looking for. Give this to Annsery to obtain Seeds of Horror.

name: Heart of Lunacy
description: The hearts of those who have been turned into skeletons by a Sorcerer of Lunacy. Collect 3 hearts of lunacy and take them to Arkenia.

name: Jewel of Darkness
description: Take this token to the grandmaster of the Dark Elven guild to change your occupation to a dark wizard.

name: Sidra's Letter 1
description: The letter of introduction written by Magister Sidra. Take this to Magister Talbot.

name: Blank Sheet 1
description: A blank scroll. Take this and hunt dark succubus to obtain bloody runes.

name: Bloody Rune 1
description: Runes written with the blood of dark succubus. Collect five and take to Magister Talbot.

name: Garmiel Book
description: The sacred book of Gran Kain, god of darkness, written in elven language. One of two books Sidra told you to find.

name: Prayer of Adonius
description: The widely beloved prayer book. Take this to Priest Adonius in the village of Gludin.

name: Penitent's Mark
description: The mark that shows one is in the course of repenting one's sins. Carry this and hunt undead skeletons in the Ruins of Despair.

name: Ashen Bones
description: Bones from undead skeletons in Ruins of Despair. Gather 10 and take to Priest Adonius.

name: Andariel Book
description: The sacred book of Einhasad, god of light, written in elven language. One of two books Sidra told you to find.

name: Orb of Abyss
description: Take this token to the grandmaster of the Dark Elven Guild to change your occupation to a shilien oracle.

name: Mark of Esquire
description: A mark that mark that indicates an esquire. Wander around many villages in Gludio and meet guard captains and high priests.

name: Charm of Grain
description: Greenis' good luck charm. Kill pincer spiders and give five red down to Greenis.

name: Sap of The World Tree
description: Sap of Worldtree that dryad Ribe likes. Find five gold leaves and give them to Thalya.

name: Lucky Potpourri
description: Northwindel's lucky potpourri. Give Northwindel two amethysts obtained from killing sukar wererat.

name: Tamil's Necklace
description: A necklace of Tamato, Perrin's guard. To show to Perrin.

name: Kluto's Memo
description: A memo from Blacksmith Kluto asking to defeat the Ol Mahum patrols.

name: Lucky Key
description: A bronze key. Hunt zombies in the swamp area, collect three bones, and take them to Charkeren.

name: Candle
description: A candle that lights up the dark. Collect two knee bones from the undeads and give them to Annsery for the Seeds of Horror.

name: Hub Scent
description: Fragrant herb potpourri. Obtain 3 hearts of lunacy from a skeleton scout and take them to Arkenia.

name: Map of Luster
description: A map given by flame salamander. Kill Pinruk and give the key of flame to salamander for the Token of Fire.

name: Key of Flame
description: The key obtained when Pinruk dies. Can obtain Token of Fire when given to salamander.

name: Flame Earring
description: The token of fire given by fire spirit salamander. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

name: Broken Bronze Mirror
description: The mirror given by wind sylph. Go to lizardman of the wastelands and obtain the wind feather to give to the wind sylph.

name: Wind Feather
description: The feather hidden by wind sylph near the wastelands. Give to sylph to receive the Token of Wind.

name: Wind Bangel
description: The token of wind given by the wind spirit sylph. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

name: Rama's Diary
description: Kill water seer and take two sparkle pebbles to water Undine for the token of water.

name: Sparkle Pebble
description: Kill water seer in Lake Permel for stones. If you give this to Water Undine, she will give you the token of water.

name: Water Necklace
description: The token of water given by water spirit Undine. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

name: Rust Gold Coin
description: The coin given by earth snake. Kill red bear and give red soil to earth snake for Token of Earth.

name: Red Soil
description: The soil obtained from killing red bear. Give to earth snake for the Token of Earth.

name: Earth Ring
description: Token of Earth given by earth snake . Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

name: Bead of Season
description: Take this bead to the high priest of the temple to change your occupation to a wizard.

name: Rusted Key
description: The key that unlocks Prigun's shackles. Take this and go to Prigun.

name: Spellbook: Aura Defense
description: Spellbook required for Aura Defense magic. Used by Elven Fighters and Dark Fighters.

name: Long Sword
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Gladius
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Bastard Sword
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Caliburs
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Great Sword
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Apprentice's Rod
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Big Hammer
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Bec De Corbin
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Lance
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Conjuror's Staff
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Knife
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Crafted Dagger
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Bow
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Compound Scale Mail
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Mithril Breastplate
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Tunic of Magic
description: A temporary item for Kamex

name: Predator's Fang
description: Collect 100 predator's fangs and take them to Pixy Murika.

name: Goblin Club
description: A sturdy club made from thick tree branches and carried by goblins. Take this to Bri Mec Tran.

name: Glass Shard
description: A broken glass piece. Can be sold in the shop for a low price.

name: Emerald
description: Can be sold in the shop for a high price.

name: Blue Onyx
description: A blue jewel. Can be sold in the shop.

name: Onyx
description: A black jewel. Can be sold in the shop.

name: Silvery Leaf
description: The leaf of a silvery mistletoe. Can be sold in the shop.

name: Bone Arrow
description: An arrow made from a piece of sharpened bone. It is used as an arrow for a D grade bow.

name: Fine Steel Arrow
description: A powerful arrow made of steel. It is used as an arrow for a C grade bow.

name: Silver Arrow
description: A steel arrow plated with silver.

name: Mithril Arrow
description: A steel arrow plated with mithril.

name: Shining Arrow
description: The most powerful arrow. Unknown material

name: Golem's Stoneheart
description: A stone found within the remains of a destroyed golem. Take this to Trader Lorento.

name: Monster Eye Carcass
description: The carcass of monster eye. Take this to Trader Salient.

name: Basilisk's Gizzard
description: The digestive organ of basilisk. Take this to Trader Salient.

name: Anatomy Diagram
description: A diagram designed by Avella physicians for human anatomy. Use this to perform Samed’s request.

name: Zombie Head
description: A head of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed of the Town of Gludio.

name: Zombie Heart
description: A heart of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

name: Zombie Liver
description: A liver of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

name: Skull
description: A skull of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

name: Rib Bone
description: A rib of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

name: Spine
description: A spine of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

name: Arm Bone
description: An arm bone of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

name: Thigh Bone
description: A thigh bone of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

name: Complete Skeleton
description: A complete skeleton put together with bone pieces by undertaker Varsak. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

name: Red Cross Badge
description: A soldier badge of foreign troops. Take this to Leopold of the Village of Gludin.

name: Blue Cross Badge
description: A badge of high ranking of Grecian foreign troops. Take this to Leopold of the Village of Gludin.

name: Black Cross Badge
description: A badge of captain ranking of Grecian foreign troops. Take this to Leopold of the Village of Gludin.

name: Spider's Carapace
description: The hard carapace of a spider. Often used to coat a shield or a helmet. Take this to Trader Arodin.

name: Spider Silk
description: Tough, stretchy spider web. Used to make bowstrings. Take this to Trader Arodin.

name: Spider Venom Sac
description: A sac with a spider's deadly poison in it. Can be sold to Trader Cullinas in the Village of Gludin.

name: Broken Stoneheart
description: A small pieces of stone found within the remains of a destroyed golem. Take this to Trader Lorento.

name: Monster Eye's Lens
description: The transparent part of monster eye. Take this to Trader Salient.

name: Wolf Claw
description: Collect 50 wolf claws and take them to Trader Payne of the weapons and armor shop.

name: Imp Shackles
description: The metal shackles attached around the neck of the imp race. Take this to Sentry Krpion.

name: Black Lion Mark
description: The mark that indicates one is a member of the Black Lion troop

description: Description of the potion that increases speed of attack

name: Guard Spear
description: A spear that guards use
