name: Proof of Blood
description: An item needed to upgrade the skill of Blood Pledge to three

name: Ingredient List
description: A list of cooking ingredients from Jonas. Mandragora essence. Honey. Dionian potato. Marsh moss. Floating eye meat.

name: Sonia's Botany Book
description: A picture that shows what a mandragora looks like. You need this to get mandragora roots.

name: Red Mandragora Root
description: Red mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia.

name: White Mandragora Root
description: Rare white mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia.

name: Red Mandragora Sap
description: Red mandragora sap. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

name: White Mandragora Sap
description: Transparent mandragora sap. One of the ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

name: Jacob's Insect Book
description: A diagram that depicts the drawing of a bee. You must possess this in order to obtain Nectar and Royal Jelly from the bloody bee or the weird bee.

name: Nectar
description: Honey water taken from a giant bee. Collect 20 of these to take them to Guard Jaycub.

name: Royal Jelly
description: A rare ingredient that can be taken only from newborn working bees. Collect these and take them to Guard Jaycub.

name: Honey
description: Honey made from the nectar you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

name: Golden Honey
description: Golden honey made from the nectar and the royal jelly you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

name: Pano's Contract
description: A contract Grocer Pano gave you. It says, if you kill Hobgoblins and bring 30 pieces of proof, he will give you potatoes as a reward.

name: Hobgoblin Amulet
description: An amulet made of a feather that Hobgoblins carry on their bodies. Collect 30 of these and take them to Grocer Pano.

name: Dionian Potato
description: The highest-quality potatoes grown in the rich soil of southern Dion. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

name: Glyvka's Botany Book
description: A picture that explains how to collect moss. You need this to collect marsh moss from Grey ants or Crimson ants.

name: Green Marsh Moss
description: Green Marsh Moss. This is sometimes used in cooking. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka.

name: Brown Marsh Moss
description: Rare Brown Marsh Moss. Its flavors are superior to the green ones. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka.

name: Green Moss Bundle
description: A bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

name: Brown Moss Bundle
description: A bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

name: Rolant's Creature Book
description: A picture that shows what a Monster Eye looks like. You need this to collect the right Monster Eye searcher or the Monster Eye gazer.

name: Body of Monster Eye
description: Severed flesh of the dead body of Monster Eye. Take this to Magister Rollant.

name: Meat of Monster Eye
description: The dead body of a Monster Eye, ready to cook. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

name: Jonas's Steak Dish 1
description: A plate that contains Jonas' Monster Eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Jonas's Steak Dish 2
description: A plate that contains Jonas' Monster Eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Jonas's Steak Dish 3
description: A plate that contains Jonas' Monster Eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Jonas's Steak Dish 4
description: A plate that contains Jonas' Monster Eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Jonas's Steak Dish 5
description: A plate that contains Jonas' Monster Eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Mirien's Review 1
description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas’ dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 2
description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas’ dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 3
description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas’ dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 4
description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas’ dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 5
description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas’ dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Harpy Feather
description: A feather taken from a Harpy. Collect these and take them to Guard Beltkem.

name: Medusa Venom
description: Poison extracted from the snake hair of a Medusa. Collect these and take them to Guard Beltkem.

name: Wyrm's Tooth
description: A sharp fang of a Wyrm. Collect these and take them to Guard Beltkem.

name: Jonas’S Salad Recipe
description: Jonas' recipe for making marsh moss salad.

name: Jonas’S Sauce Recipe
description: Jonas' recipe for making mandragora sauce.

name: Jonas’S Salad Recipe
description: Jonas' recipe for making Monster Eye meat steak.

name: Crystal: D Grade
description: The crystal of D Grades

name: Crystal: C Grade
description: The crystal of C Grades

name: Crystal: B Grade
description: The crystal of B Grades

name: Crystal: A Grade
description: The crystal of A Grades

name: Crystal: S Grade
description: The crystal of S Grades

name: Soulshot: D-grade
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a D-grade weapon.

name: Soulshot: C-grade
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a C-grade weapon.

name: Soulshot: B-grade
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a B-grade weapon.

name: Soulshot: A-grade
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with an A-grade weapon.

name: Soulshot: S-grade
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with an S-grade weapon.

name: Gludin Panacen
description: A medicated herb from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio.

name: Gludin Vermouth
description: Medicated wine from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio.

name: Artemeter
description: A medicated herb from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio.

name: Kasha Wolf Fang
description: A fang that is obtained by killing a kasha wolf. Collect fifty and take these to Praetorian Rukain.

name: Grave Robber's Head
description: The head of goblin robbers, who damaged the graves of Orc ancestors. Collect fifty to take to Seer Livina.

name: Black Soulstone
description: A black soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees.

name: Red Soulstone
description: A red soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees.

name: Maraku Werewolf Head
description: The head of a Maraku Werewolf that has been cut off after they were defeated. Collect forty of these and take them to Prefect Brukurse.

name: Darkwing Bat Fang
description: A fang of a Darkwing bat. Collect 70 of these and take them to Neruga Chief Tantus.

name: Varangka's Parasite
description: An evil parasite that summons Varangka's Trackers.

name: Kasha Parasite
description: A parasite-type evil spirit that comes out of the gray bear polluted by kasha's evil spirit. This is the key calling forth the kasha totem spirit.

name: Kasha Crystal
description: A crystal obtained by killing the gray bear totem polluted by kasha's evil spirit. Take this to Seer Tanapi.

name: Black Wolf Pelt
description: Pelt of a black wolf. Collect 40 to take to Marife Redbonnet.

name: Goblin Necklace
description: A necklace obtained by killing a low-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Elder Spiron.

name: Goblin Pendant
description: A necklace obtained by killing a high-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Elder Spiron.

name: Goblin Lord Pendant
description: A necklace obtained by killing the goblin lord. Collect these and take them to Elder Spiron.

name: Suspicious Memo
description: A suspicious memo obtained by killing a goblin brigand leader. Take this to Elder Spiron.

name: Suspicious Contract
description: A suspicious contract completed by collecting suspicious memos. This contract reveals that the Silver Balance Guild requested the brigands to attack the freight wagons.

name: Oriharukon Ore
description: Chrysolite ore taken by defeating Utuku orcs. Collect these and take them to Elder Filaur.

name: Torn Map Fragment
description: A part of the map that reveals the hidden vein of Chrysolite. If you collect four pieces, you can complete a map.

name: Hidden Ore Map
description: A map that reveals the hidden vein of Chrysolite. Take this to Elder Filaur.

name: Bat Fang
description: A fang taken by killing a blade bat or a barb bat. Collect 100 and take them to Elder Keef

name: Floating Stone
description: A stone that floats on water. Obtain it from Magical Weaver. Collect 50 and take them to Elder Arin.

name: Tarantula Spider Silk
description: The spider silk that makes when making their nests. Collect these and take them to Trader Mion.

name: Tarantula Spinnerette
description: A pocket shaped organ that makes spider silk. Take this to Defender Nathan.

name: Giant Spider Skin
description: The husk of a giant spider that you peeled off. Collect there and take them to Edmond.

name: Voucher of Flame
description: This token represents the qualification of Orc fighters. Take this and go to the Guardian of Flame Vullkus.

name: Necklace of Flame
description: The necklace of flame given by Vullkus. Hand this to Kakai, the Lord of Flame, and also the king of the Orcs.

name: License of Miner
description: A license given to Dwarves to allow them mining. Take this and go to Foreman Laferon.

name: Laferon's Recommendation
description: The recommendation of Foreman Laferon. Take this and go to First Elder Lockirin.

name: Totem of Hestui
description: The totem of the Hestui. Can be sold in the shop for a high price.

name: Maraku Werewolf Totem
description: Maraku Wolfmen Totem. Can be sold in the shop.

name: Grandma's Pearl
description: An article left by the grandmother of the redbonnet. Can be sold in the shop for a high price.

name: Grandma's Mirror
description: An article left by the grandmother of the redbonnet. Can be sold in the shop.

name: Grandma's Necklace
description: An article left by the grandmother of the redbonnet. Can be sold in the shop.

name: Grandma's Hairpin
description: An article left by the grandmother of the redbonnet. Can be sold in the shop.

name: Necklace of Courage
description: A necklace that is given to young Orcs who have proved their courage

name: Necklace of Valor
description: The necklace that is given to young Orcs who have proved their valor

name: Ring of Raccoon
description: A ring given to apprentices of the Bronze Key Guild

name: Ring of Firefly
description: A ring given to apprentices of the Black Anvil Guild

name: Butcher's Sword
description: A sword granted to young Orc fighters who distinguished themselves at war

name: Silversmith Hammer
description: A hammer silversmiths of the ancient Elmoreden used

name: Spellbook: Confusion
description: Spellbook required for Confusion magic. Used by Palus Knights and Assassins.

name: Spellbook: Charm
description: Spellbook required for Charm magic. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.

name: Spellbook: Resurrection
description: Spellbook required for Resurrection magic. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles, and Shillien Oracles.

name: Spellbook: Kiss of Eva
description: Spellbook required for Kiss of Eva magic. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.

name: Spellbook: Corpse Life Drain
description: Spellbook required for Corpse Life Drain magic. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards.

name: Spellbook: Body To Mind
description: Spellbook required for Body To Mind magic. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards.

name: Amulet: Flame Chant
description: Amulet required for the Flame Chant spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Power Of Paagrio
description: Amulet required for the Power of Paagrio spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Blessing Of Paagrio
description: Amulet required for the Blessing of Paagrio spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Fire Chant
description: Amulet required for the Fire Chant spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Battle Chant
description: Amulet required for the Battle Chant spell. Used by Orc Mystics.

name: Amulet: Shield Chant
description: Amulet required for the Shield Chant spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Soul Shield
description: Amulet required for the Soul Shield spell. Used by Orc Mystics.

name: Amulet: Life Drain
description: Amulet required for the Life Drain spell. Used by Orc Mystics.

name: Amulet: Fear
description: Amulet required for the Fear spell. Used by Orc Mystics.

name: Amulet: Venom
description: Amulet required for the Venom spell. Used by Orc Mystics.

name: Amulet: Seal of Chaos
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Chaos spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Dreaming Spirit
description: Amulet required for the Spirit Dream spell. Used by Orc Mystics.

name: Amulet: Impede Seal
description: Amulet required for the Impede Seal spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Icy Flame
description: Amulet required for the Icy Flame spell. Used by Orc Mystics.

name: Amulet: Blaze Quake
description: Amulet required for the Blaze Quake spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Aura Sink
description: Amulet required for the Aura Sink spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Madness
description: Amulet required for the Madness spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Blaze Quake
description: An amulet that is needed for the Blaze Quake spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Seal of Binding
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Binding spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Seal of Poison
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Poison spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape
description: A magical scroll that relocates the player to the nearest village

name: Honey Khandar
description: A miraculous medicine made of the mixture of honey and khandar extract. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bear Fur Cloak
description: A cloak made of grizzly bear's fur. Excellent for keeping warm. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bloody Axe
description: An axe that holds the blood of wild animals. It is said to strengthen its owner’s life force. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Ancestor Skull
description: A skull of an ancestor of Urutus. It is said to strengthen its owner's life force. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Spider Dust
description: A grain of powder made of dried legs of poisonous spiders. Smelling it will make you feel refreshed. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Deep Sea Orb
description: A pearl brought out of a deep sea. It is said to help predict the future. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bolter's List
description: The list of things that Bolter wants you to bring from the village.

name: Mining Boots
description: A pair of mining boots you got from Trader Garita. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Miner's Pick
description: A miner's pick you got from Blacksmith Brunon. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Boomboom Powder
description: A sack of boomboom powder you got from Trader Cha-Li. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Redstone Beer
description: Delicious beer you got from Warehouse Chief Reed. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Bolter's Smelly Socks
description: A pair of socks that Miner Bolter gave you. For what...?

name: Hatos's Order 1
description: The order to kill Varangka's Messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Hatos's Order 2
description: The order states that you must kill Varangka's Messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Hatos's Order 3
description: The order states that you must kill Varangka's Messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Dark Elf
description: The secret letter that Varangka is sending to Dark Elven Magister Kaland. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Human
description: The secret letter that Varangka is sending to Duke Van Halter. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Elf
description: The secret letter that Varangka is sending to Elven Master Laria. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Gouph's Contract
description: Collector Gouph drew up this contract when buying the star diamond from Trader Reep. Take this to Trader Reep.

name: Reep's Contract
description: Trader Reep drew up this contract when he requested the delivery of the star diamond. Take this to Carrier Torocco.

name: Elven Wine
description: Carrier Torocco bought this high quality wine to give it to his old friend, Maron, as a present. Take this to Miner Maron.

name: Brunon's Dice
description: This dice was specially made for gambling. Take these to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Brunon's Contract
description: This contract says if Brunon gets the 20 stolen jewels back from goblins, he can get the star diamond back.

name: Aquamarine
description: This jewel is obtained by the goblin brigand leader. Take 10 aquamarines and 10 chrysoberyls to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Chrysoberyl
description: This jewel is obtained by the goblin brigand leader. Take 10 aquamarines and 10 chrysoberyls to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Gem Box
description: Blacksmith Brunon gives this Gem Box. Take this to Collector Gouph.

name: Coal Piece
description: This coal piece is in the gem box. Take this to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Brunon's Letter
description: Blacksmith Brunon sends this letter to Warehouse Keeper Murphrin asking for the right box.

name: Berry Tart
description: Sweet strawberry-flavored tart. Warehouse Keeper Murphrin sends this to Warehouse Keeper Airy as a present of apology.

name: Bat Diagram
description: This diagram shows the blade bat in details. Take this and go hunt blade bats to obtain the star diamond.

name: Star Diamond
description: Everyone is looking for this diamond. Take this to the real owner.

name: Starstone 1
description: A mineral collected from the destroyed greystone golem. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gatekeeper Tamil.

name: Starstone 2
description: A mineral obtained by defeated whinstone golems. Collect twenty and take them to Gatekeeper Wirphy.

name: Mirien's Review 2
description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas' dish. Take this and go to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 3
description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas' dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 4
description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas' dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 5
description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas' dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Green Blood
description: Goblin's blood. If you have enough of this item, the Kuruka Ratman Leader appears.

name: Goblin Dwelling Map
description: A map showing goblins' dwelling. Take this and find the goblin tribes and destroy them.

name: Kuruka Ratman Tooth
description: A tooth obtained after killing Kuruka ratman leader. Collect ten of these to take to Prefect Karukia.

name: Betrayer Sue Report
description: A record that shows where the betrayer Sue is. Slay the betrayer and take proof to Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Wanuk Report
description: A record that shows where the betrayer Wanuk is. Slay the betrayer and take proof to Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Chewba Report
description: He is located between the army post of Grecia and the northern part of the Grim Ruins. Dispose of him and take the mark as a proof to Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Heitafu Report
description: He can be found in the advance outpost located in the southwestern part of the Tollgate. Dispose of him and take the mark as a proof to Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Picubo Report
description: A record that shows where the betrayer Picubo is. Punish him and take his severed head to Prefect Kasman as proof.

name: Betrayer Bumbum Report
description: He is located near the Tollgate. Dispose of him and take the mark as a proof to Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Minsku Report
description: He is located in the southern part of the Wasteland near the sea. Dispose of him and take the mark as a proof to Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Chuchu Report
description: A record that shows where the betrayer Chuchu is. Punish him and take his severed head to Prefect Kasman as proof.

name: Betrayer Umbar Report
description: He is located close to an intersection of three roads in the Neutral Zone. Dispose of him and take the mark as a proof to Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Zakan Report
description: He is located in the northern part of the wasteland near the outpost. Dispose of him and take the mark as a proof to Prefect Kasman. Dispose of him and take the mark as a proof to Prefect Kasman.

name: Head of Betrayer
description: The head of a traitor orc. Collect 2 and take them to Prefect Kasman in Gludin Village.

name: Mark of Raider
description: A necklace given to Orc raider that has earned the qualification to become an Orc raider. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc raider.

name: Pomegranate
description: A red pomegranate fruit given by Gantaki. Take this and go to Khavatari Rosheek.

name: Leather Pouch 1
description: A leather pouch given by Khavatari Rosheek. Take this and hunt kasha bears and collect five of their claws.

name: Leather Pouch 2
description: A leather pouch given by Khavatari Rosheek. Hunt kasha blade spiders with this and collect five talons.

name: Leather Pouch 3
description: A leather pouch Khavatari Rosheek gave you. Take this to hunt Scarlet Salamanders for five of their scales.

name: Leather Pouch 1 (Full)
description: A pouch that contains five kasha bear claws. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek.

name: Leather Pouch 2 (Full)
description: A pouch that contains five pincers of kasha blade spider talon. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek.

name: Leather Pouch 3 (Full)
description: A pouch that contains five scales from the Scarlet Salamander. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek.

name: Kasha Bear Claw
description: A claw pulled out from kasha bear after killing it. Collect five of these.

name: Kasha Blade Spider Talon
description: A talon pulled out from kasha blade spider after killing it. Collect five of these.

name: Scarlet Salamander Scale
description: A scale of scarlet salamander. Gather five of these.

name: Fiery Spirit Scroll
description: The first scroll containing secret of kabart, the Orcs' traditional martial arts.

name: Rosheek's Letter
description: A letter written by Khavatari Rosheek. Take this to Gantaki Zu Urutu.

name: Gantaki's Letter of Recommendation
description: Gantaki's letter of recommendation. Receive the help of Gatekeeper Tamil and take this recommendation to Prefect Kasman in the Village of Gludin.

name: Fig
description: A fig given by Prefect Kasman. Take this to Khavatari Toruku.

name: Leather Purse 4
description: A leather purse given by Khavatari Toruku. Take this, kill fighters of various races and collect 12 tokens.

name: Leather Pouch 4 (Full)
description: A full pouch of 12 tokens after killing fighters of various races. Take this to Khavatari Toruku.

name: Vuku Orc Tusk
description: A tusk obtained after killing vuku Orc. Gather three of these.

name: Ratman Fang
description: A fang from a dead ratman fighter. Gather three of these.

name: Langk Lizardman Tooth
description: A tooth obtained after killing langk lizardman. Gather three of these.

name: Felim Lizardman Tooth
description: A tooth obtained after killing the Felim Lizardman. Gather 3 of these.

name: Iron Will Scroll
description: The second scroll that contains secret of the Orcs' traditional martial arts, Kabart.

name: Toruku's Letter
description: A letter from Khavatari Toruku. Take this to Prefect Kasman.

name: Khavatari Totem
description: A token given to one who has qualifications to change occupations to Orc monk. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc monk.

name: Fire Charm
description: A charm with inscription of fire mantra. Take this and find the three items that Tataru spoke of.

name: Kasha Bear Pelt
description: A pelt of kasha bear. Take to Tataru along with kasha bladespider husk and fiery egg.

name: Kasha Blade Spider Husk
description: A husk of kasha bladespider. Take to Tataru along with kasha bear pelt and fiery egg.

name: Fiery Egg 1
description: A spirit egg obtained from Scarlet Salamander. Take to Tataru along with kasha bear pelt and kasha bladespider husk.

name: Hestui Mask
description: A mask in shape of bear. Take this and go to Hestui Totem Spirit.

name: Fiery Egg 2
description: A spirit egg received from Scarlet Salamander. Take this to the Hestui Totem Spirit.

name: Totem Spirit Claw
description: A claw received from Hestui Totem Spirit. Take this and go to Tataru.

name: Tataru's Letter of Recommendation
description: A letter written by Tataru. Take this to Seer Umos in the Town of Gludio.

name: Flame Charm
description: A charm with inscription of flame mantra. Take this and gather grizzly blood and take to Seer Umos.

name: Grizzly Blood
description: A glass bottle filled with grizzly blood. Gather three and take to Seer Umos.

name: Blood Cauldron
description: A cauldron filled with grizzly blood. Take this to the Dudamara Totem Spirit.

name: Spirit Net
description: A net made with spirit's spider silk. Use this to capture Durka Spirit hidden inside poison spiders.

name: Bound Durka Spirit
description: Durka spirit bound inside spirit net. Take this to the Dudamara Totem Spirit.

name: Durka Parasite
description: An evil parasite spirit that comes out from spiders contaminated with the evil durka spirit. It is the key for calling upon the evil durka spirit.

name: Totem Spirit Blood
description: Blood spilt by the Dudamara Totem Spirit. Take this and go to Seer Umos.

name: Mask of Medium
description: A token that shows one has the qualifications to become an Orc shaman. Take this to the high prefect, to change your occupation to an Orc shaman.

name: Silvera's Ring
description: A ring given to artisan aspirants by Blacksmith Silvera. Strike down boogle ratman gang and collect their front teeth.

name: 1St Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for passing the 1st artisan test. To take the next test, you must go to Blacksmith Kluto of the village Gludin.

name: 2Nd Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for passing the 2nd artisan test. Take this and go to Blacksmith Kluto in Gludin.

name: Final Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for passing the final artisan test. Take this to the head blacksmith to change occupations to an artisan.

name: Boogle Ratman Tooth
description: The ugly front bucktooth of a boogle ratman. Just looking at it will make you nauseous. Collect ten of these and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

name: Boogle Ratman Leader's Big Tooth
description: The boogle ratman leader's big tooth. Before its stink make you pass out, collect 2 of them and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

name: Kluto's Letter
description: Blacksmith Kluto's letter. Take to Blacksmith Pinter in the Town of Gludio.

name: Footprint of Thief
description: Trace left by thieves. Kill Vuku Orc fighters, recover stolen items and take them to Blacksmith Kluto.

name: Stolen Secret Box 1
description: A secret box stolen by Vuku orc fighters. The contents of the box are unknown, but anyway, take it to Blacksmith Pinter.

name: Secret Box 2
description: A secret box received from Pinter. The contents are unknown, but do not worry and take it to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin.

name: Ring of Raven
description: A mark certifying that one has earned the right to become a scavenger. If you take it to a Warehouse Chief, you can transfer your class to  scavenger.

name: Pippi's Letter of Recommendation
description: A letter of introduction written by Collector Pipi. Take this to Trader Mion.

name: Raut's Teleport Scroll
description: An order sheet given by Warehouse keeper Rout. Give it to Torai, in the south of the Corridor of Death.

name: Succubus Undies
description: The underwear of Succubus received from Torai. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Raut of Gludin.

name: Mion's Letter
description: A letter sent from Trader Mion to her brother. Take this letter and go to Master Toma.

name: Bronk's Ingot
description: An ingot to be given to Chief Blacksmith Bronk.

name: Shari's Axe
description: An axe to be given to Trader Cha-Li.

name: Zimenf's Potion
description: A potion to give to priest Zimenf of the earth.

name: Bronk's Pay
description: Product cost given by Chief Blacksmith Bronk. Take this to Trader Mion.

name: Shari's Pay
description: Product cost given by Cha-Li. Take this to Trader Mion.

name: Zimenf's Pay
description: Product cost given by Zimenf. Take this to Trader Mion.

name: Bear Picture
description: A picture of bear received by Master Toma. Take this to hunt hunter bears, then honey bear will appear.

name: Tarantula Picture
description: A picture of spider received by Master Toma. Use this to hunt tarantulas.

name: Honey Jar
description: A honey jar taken from a honey bear. Collect five and take them to Master Toma.

name: Bead
description: A bead obtained from tarantula. Gather twenty of these and give to Master Toma.

name: Bead Parcel
description: A parcel made of beads. Give this to Warehouse Keeper Rout of Gludin.

name: Gatekeeper Charm
description: Used to teleport from the Orc Village to the Gludin

name: Gatekeeper Token
description: Used to teleport from the Dwarven Village to Gludin

name: Cursed Maingauche
description: Cursed Maingauche. Although its attack power is weak, it gives bleeding effect with a certain rate during critical attacks

name: Wood
description: A material used to make dwarven items. Can be sold in the shop.

name: Stem
description: A material used to make dwarven items. Can be sold in the shop.

name: Steel Powder
description: A material used to make dwarven items. Can be sold in the shop.

name: World Map
description: A map of Aden area

name: Recipe: Wooden Arrow
description: The recipe for a wooden arrow. Requires Create Item skill level 1. The success rate is 100%.

name: Spellbook: Summon Shadow
description: The spellbook used to learn Summon Shadow. Used by Dark Wizards.

name: Spellbook: Summon Mew the Cat
description: Spellbook required for Summon Mew the Cat magic. Used by Human Wizards.

name: Spellbook: Summon Unicorn Boxer
description: Spellbook required for Summon Unicorn Boxer magic. Used by Elven Wizards.

name: Spellbook: Summon Unicorn Mirage
description: Spellbook required for Summon Unicorn Mirage magic. Used by Elven Wizards.

name: Spellbook: Summon Silhouette
description: Spellbook required for Summon Silhouette magic. Used by Dark Wizards.

name: Scroll of Escape: Clan Hall
description: A scroll that relocates you to your hideaway. If you don't have a hideaway, it will relocate you to the nearest village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Castle
description: A scroll that relocates you to your castle. If you don't have a castle, it will relocate you to the nearest village.

name: Antidote
description: A reagent that neutralizes poison

name: Greater Antidote
description: A high-quality reagent that neutralizes powerful poison

name: Bandage
description: A medical bandage that stops bleeding when injured

name: Emergency Dressing
description: A medical bandage that stops bleeding fast when severely injured

name: Soulshot: No Grade
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a No grade weapon.

name: Kendell's Order 1
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Uph. He should be somewhere around the ruins over the hill, west of the Elven village.

name: Kendell's Order 2
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Kracha. He should be somewhere around the Nine obelisk, southwest of the Elven village.

name: Kendell's Order 3
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Bhato. He should be somewhere around the entrance of the underground fortress of the Elves.

name: Kendell's Order 4
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Tanukia. He should be somewhere around the open-air theatre ruins, southwest of the Elven village.

name: Kendell's Order 5
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Turel. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, northwest of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's Order 6
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Rocco. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, west of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's Order 7
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Kamut. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, south of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's Order 8
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Murutika. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, east of Lake Iris.

name: Kaboo Chief Torque1
description: A necklace taken by killing the chief of Kaboo orcs. Take this to Sentinel Kendnell.

name: Kaboo Chief Torque 2
description: A necklace taken by killing the chief of Kaboo orcs. Take this to Sentinel Kendnell.

name: Turek Dog Tag
description: A military identification necklace of Turek orc fighters. Collect these and take them to Peotre for a reward.

name: Turek Medallion
description: A necklace of Turek orc officers. Collect these and take them to Piotre for a reward.

name: Clay Urn Fragment
description: A relic of the Elmoaden Empire. A piece of a broken clay urn.

name: Brass Trinket Piece
description: A relic of the Elmoaden Empire. A part of a brass trinket.

name: Bronze Mirror Piece
description: A relic of the Elmoaden Empire. A part of a bronze mirror.

name: Jade Necklace Bead
description: A relic of the Elmoaden Empire. A part of a jade necklace.

name: Ancient Clay Urn
description: A clay urn of the Elmoaden Empire.

name: Ancient Brass Tiara
description: A relic of the Elmoaden Empire. A formal brass tiara

name: Ancient Bronze Mirror
description: A relic of the Elmoaden Empire. A bronze mirror.

name: Ancient Jade Necklace
description: A relic of the Empire. A jade necklace.

name: Spellbook: Chant of Life
description: Spellbook required for the Chant of Life spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Keltir Fang 1
description: A fang taken by killing Nepitir. Collect four and take them to Master.

name: Keltir Fang 2
description: A fang taken by killing Nepitir. Collect four and take them to the Magister.

name: Keltir Fang 3
description: A fang taken by killing Nepitir. Collect four and take them to the Guardian of the Mothertree.

name: Keltir Fang 4
description: A fang taken by killing Nepitir. Collect four and take them to the Abyssal Celebrant.

name: Keltir Fang 5
description: A fang taken by killing Nepitir. Collect four and take them to the Priest of fire.

name: Keltir Fang 6
description: A fang taken by killing Nepitir. Collect four and take them to the Miner.

name: Avadon Breastplate
description: When worn with Avadon Gaiters, Avadon Circlet, Avadon Gloves and Avadon Boots, maximum HP will increase by 294. If one is equipped with an Avadon Shield as well, shield defense rate will increase by 24%.

name: Doom Plate Armor
description: Composite Armor consisting of upper and lower garments. When worn with Doom Helmet, Doom Gloves and Doom Boots,  maximum HP will be +320, breath gauge will be increased, STR -3 and CON +3. If one is equipped with a Doom Shield as well, shield defense rate will increase by 24%.

name: Blood Plate Armor
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Inferno Plate Armor
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Zubei's Leather Shirt
description: When worn with Zubei's Leather Gaiters, Zubei's Helmet, Zubei's Gauntlets and Zubei's Boots, Evasion will increase by 4.

name: Avadon Leather Armor
description: When worn with Avadon Circlet, Avadon Gloves and Avadon Boots, M. Def. will increase by 5.25% and weight limit will increase by 5795.

name: Blue Wolf Leather Armor
description: Armor consisting of upper and lower garments. When worn with Blue Wolf Helmet, Blue Wolf Gloves and Blue Wolf Boots, one will have the effects of P. Def. +5%, Casting Spd. +15%, INT -2, MEN +3 and WIT -1.

name: Leather Armor of Doom
description: Armor consisting of upper and lower garments. When worn with Doom Helmet, Doom Gloves and Doom Boots, breath gauge will be increased, P. Atk. +2.7%, MP recovery speed +2.5%, STR -1, CON -2, DEX +3 and the probability of being poisoned  reduced 20%.

name: Blood Leather Armor
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Nightmarish Leather Armor
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Inferno Leather Armor
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Tunic of Zubei
description: When worn with Stockings of Zubei, Zubei's Helmet, Zubei's Gauntlets and Zubei's Boots, M. Def. will increase by 10% and MP recovery speed will decrease by 5%.

name: Blue Wolf Tunic
description: When worn with Blue Wolf Stockings, Blue Wolf Helmet, Blue Wolf Gloves and Blue Wolf Boots, maximum MP will be increased +206, MP recovery speed +5%, INT-2, MEN-1, and WIT+3.

name: Tunic of Doom
description: When worn with Stockings of Doom, Doom Helmet, Doom Gloves and Doom Boots, Speed  will be increased by 7, breath gauge will be increased, MP recovery speed +5%, INT+2, MEN+1, and WIT-3.

name: Avadon Robe
description: When worn with Avadon Circlet, Avadon Gloves and Avadon Boots, P. Def. will increase by 5% and Casting Spd. will increase by 15%.

name: Dark Crystal Robe
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Robe of Nightmare
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Inferno Robe
description: A one-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

name: Mark of Challenger
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Challenger. An item for occupational change.

name: Letter of Kash
description: Kash’s introduction letter. Take this letter to Martian in Giran Castle Town.

name: Watchers Eye1
description: An item obtained from the monster, Goru. Take this to Martian in Giran Castle Town.

name: Watchers Eye2
description: An item obtained from the monster, Baraham. Show this to Raldo and...

name: Scroll of Shyslassy
description: An ancient scroll obtained by slaying Shyslassis. Take this to Kash in Dion Castle Town.

name: Broken Key
description: A key obtained by slaying Shyslassis. This key is needed in order to open the Chest of Shyslassis.

name: Mark of Duty
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of Duty. An item for occupational change.

name: Letter of Dustin
description: A letter given by Dustin. Deliver the letter to Grandmaster Hannavalt in Giran Castle Town.

name: Knights Tear
description: Obtained from the ghost of Sir Harrod. Take this to Sir Aaron Tanford.

name: Mirror of Orpic
description: This is needed in order to speak with the ghost of Sir Talianus. Use this to defeat the hanged-man reaper.

name: Tear of Confession
description: Obtained from the ghost of Sir Talianus. Take this to Sir Kiel Nighthawk.

name: Report Piece
description: You may obtain this by hunting strains and ghouls. Gather 10 pieces and put them together to create Talianus’ Report.

name: Report Piece
description: The completed report. After speaking with Sir Kiel Nighthawk, deliver the report to the ghost of Sir Talianus.

name: Tear of Loyalty
description: This item can be obtained from Isael Silvershadow. Take it to Priest Dustin.

name: Militas Article
description: You can receive this item when you catch a Leto lizardman. Collect 20 of them and take them to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Saints Ashes Urn
description: An object received from Priest Dustin. Deliver this to Sir Windawood.

name: Athebaldt's Skull
description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's ribs and Athebaldt’s shin.

name: Athebaldt's Ribs
description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's skull and Athebaldt’s shin.

name: Athebaldt's Shin
description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's ribs and Athebaldt’s skull.

name: Letter of Windawood
description: A letter received from Sir Colin Windawood. Show this to Priest Dustin.

name: Dufners Letter
description: A letter sent from Master Dufner to Master Terry of Dion Castle Town.

name: Terry's Order1
description: Investigate the neer crawler fraks of the Execution Ground.

name: Terry's Order
description: “Investigate Ol Mahum captain, Turek orc warlord, ant captain and Turak bugbear warrior.”

name: Terry's Letter
description: A letter sent by Master Terry to Trader Viktor of the Hunters’ Village.

name: Viktor's Letter
description: A letter sent by Trader Viktor to Master Terry of Dion Castle Town. The letter has Terry’s seal.

name: Hawk Eye's Letter
description: A letter sent by Hawkeye to Trader Viktor of the Hunters' Village.

name: Mysterious Runestone
description: A mysterious runestone obtained after slaying neer crawler fraks. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Ol Mahum Runestone
description: A mysterious runestone obtained after slaying the Ol Mahum Captain. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Turek Runestone
description: A mysterious runestone obtained after slaying the Turek Orc Overlord. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Ant Runestone
description: A mysterious runestone obtained after slaying the Ant Captain. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Turak Bugbear Runestone
description: A mysterious runestone obtained after slaying the Turak Bugbear Warrior. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Terry's Box
description: A chest containing the mysterious runestones. Take this to Trader Viktor of the Hunters’ Village.

name: Viktor's Request
description: A request issued by Trader Viktor. "Please gather 10 Medusa Scales."

name: Medusas Scales
description: The scales of the medusa. Gather 10 of these and take them to Trader Viktor.

name: Silens Runestone
description: Strange runestones obtained from the bodies of mutant species. They seem to be related to Shilen, the Goddess of Death.

name: Analysis Request
description: A request letter sent to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower from Trader Viktor. The letter asks Marina to analyze the Dark Bezoar.

name: Marinas Letter
description: A letter sent by Magister Marina to Blacksmith Bruno of the Dwarven Village.

name: Experiment Tools
description: Experimental tools crafted by Blacksmith Bruno. Deliver these to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower.

name: Analysis Result
description: A document where Magister Marina has organized the analysis results of the Dark Bezoar. Deliver this to Master Terry of Dion Castle Town.

name: Terry's Order3
description: Master Terry’s orders. The orders give instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36.

name: List of Host
description: A list of the bezoar hosts. “Marsh stakato drone, Breka Orc Overlord, ant warrior captain, Leto Lizardman Warrior”

name: Abyss Runestone1
description: The Dark Bezoar retrieved from the body of a Marsh Stakato Drone. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Runestone2
description: The runestone retrieved from the body of the Breka Orc Overlord. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Runestone3
description: The runestone retrieved from the body of the Ant Captain. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Runestone4
description: The runestone retrieved from the body of the Leto Lizardman Warrior. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Terry's Report
description: A report detailing information about the runestone incident. Take this to Master Dufner of Giran Castle Town.

name: Mark of Seeker
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Seeker. An occupation change related item.

name: Mark of Scholar
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Scholar. An occupation change related item.

name: Mirien's Sigil1
description: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete High Priest Sylvain’s request.

name: Mirien's Sigil2
description: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete Grand Sorcerer Jurek’s request.

name: Mirien's Sigil3
description: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete Sage Cronus’ request.

name: Mirien's Instruction
description: A note that contains Magister Mirien’s instructions. The note gives instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36.

name: Marya's Letter1
description: A letter sent by Marya to Captain Lucas of Dion Castle Town.

name: Marya's Letter2
description: A letter sent by Marya to Astrologer Creta of the Village of Floran.

name: Lucas's Letter
description: A letter sent by Captain Lucas of Dion Castle Town to Marya.

name: Lucilla's Handbag
description: The handbag left by Marya’s friend Lucillas on the night of the theft. Take this to Astrologer Creta.

name: Creta's Letter1
description: A letter sent by Astrologer Creta to Marya of Dion Castle Town.

name: Creta's Painting1
description: A painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Marya.

name: Creta's Painting2
description: A painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Captain Lucas.

name: Creta's Painting3
description: A painting painted by Astrologer Creta. The shadow in the painting is that of a Leto Lizardman Warrior.

name: Brown Scroll Scrap
description: A scrap of a scroll that contains directions on how to create the Crystal of Purity. Gather 5 of these and take them to Marya.

name: Crystal of Purity1
description: A crystal used to purify the earth. Take this to High Priest Sylvain of Dion Castle Town.

name: High Priest's Sigil
description: A mark received from High Priest Sylvain. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the High Priest.

name: Grand Magister's Sigil
description: A mark received from Grand Sorcerer Jurek. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the Grand Magister.

name: Crono's Sigil
description: A mark received from Sage Cronus. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of Cronus.

name: Sylvain's Letter
description: High Priest Sylvain’s letter. Take this and go to Marya of Dion Castle Town.

name: Symbol of Sylvain
description: A symbol given to those who have passed High Priest Sylvain’s test. Take this to Magister Mirien of Dion Castle Town.

name: Jurek's List
description: The list of evil creatures that Grand Magister Jurek asked you to investigate: Monster Eye Destroyer, Breka Orc Shaman, and Shackle

name: Monster Eye Destroyer Skin
description: A beamer’s skin. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Sorcerer Jurek of Giran Castle Town.

name: Shaman's Necklace
description: A Breka orc shaman’s necklace. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek in Giran Castle Town.

name: Shackle's Scalp
description: Skin of the shackle’s head. Gather 2 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Giran Castle Town.

name: Symbol of Jurek
description: A symbol given to those who have passed Grand Sorcerer Jurek’s test. Take this to Magister Mirien of Dion Castle Town.

name: Cronos Letter
description: A letter sent by Sage Cronos to Magister Dieter of Giran Castle Town.

name: Dieter's Key
description: A key to the chest where Dieter has hidden the Scripture of Knowledge. Take this to Astrologer Creta at the Village of Floran.

name: Creta's Letter2
description: Creta’s letter informing the theft of the Scripture of Knowledge. Take this to Magister Dieter at Giran Castle Town.

name: Dieter's Letter
description: A letter from Magister Dieter to Trader Edroc of the weapons shop of Hunter’s Village.

name: Dieter's Diary
description: Magister Dieter’s diary, given by himself in hopes that it may be of aid in recovering the Scripture of Knowledge.

name: Raut's Letter Envelope
description: A plain letter envelope with no contents. The envelope is addressed "To Warehouse Keeper Raut”.

name: Treaf's Ring
description: A ring given by Drunkard Treaf. Show this ring to the friends to whom Treaf has entrusted the Scripture of Knowledge.

name: Scripture Chapter 1
description: The 1st book of the Scripture of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 2
description: The 2nd book of the Scripture of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 3
description: The 3rd book of the Scripture of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 4
description: The 4th book of the Scripture of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Valkon's Request
description: Warehouse Keeper Valkon's request. The instructions are to bring back the Crystal of Purity.

name: Poitan's Notes
description: Blacksmith Poitan’s account books. Take this to Sage Kasian of the Wastelands.

name: Scripture of Knowledge
description: A scripture edited by Sage Cronus. It is said to contain all the knowledge of the past. It is comprised of a total of 4 books.

name: Strong Liquor
description: As its name indicates, a strong liquor. Take this to Drunkard Treaf at the harbor.

name: Crystal of Purity2
description: An item that Warehouse Keeper Valkon in Giran Castle Town agreed to trade with you for scripture chapter 2.

name: Kasian's List
description: 10 Ghoul’s Skins, 12 units of Medusa’s Blood, 5 units of Fettered Soul's Ichor, and 5 Enchanted Gargoyle's Nails.

name: Ghoul's Skin
description: The skin of a ghoul. Gather 10 of these and take them to Sage Kasian.

name: Medusa's Blood
description: Medusa blood. Gather 12 bottles and take them to Sage Kasian.

name: Fettered Soul's Ichor
description: The ichor of a Crimson Bind. Gather 5 units and take them to Sage Kasian.

name: Enchted Gargoyle's Nail
description: The enchanted nails of a gargoyle. Gather 5 of these and take them to Sage Kasian.

name: Symbol of Cronos
description: The mark of Cronus, the top sage of the continent. Take this to Magister Mirien at Dion Castle Town.

name: Mark of Pilgrim
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Pilgrim. An occupation change related item.

name: Book of Sage
description: A book given by Sage Kasian. Take this book to Hermit Santiago.

name: Voucher of Trial
description: A mark given by Hermit Santiago. Show this to Seer Tanapi of the Orc Village.

name: Spirit of Flame
description: Proof that you have an understanding of the Spirit of Flame. In order to carry out the next stage of this trial, go see Gauri Twinklerock of Dwarven Village.

name: Essense of Flame
description: A jewel obtained from the Lava Salamander. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus.

name: Book of Gerald
description: A book given by Priest Gerald. The book looks very cheap.

name: Gray Badge
description: A badge given by Wanderer Dorf. Take this to Father Prim at Giran Castle Town.

name: Picture of Nahir
description: A picture of the monster, Nahir. Defeat Nahir, who lurks in the depths of the Elven Ruins on Talking Island.

name: Hair of Nahir
description: The hair of the monster, Nahir. Take this to Priest Potter.

name: Statue of Einhasad
description: A statue of Einhasad given by Priest Potter. Take this to Andellia, who lives near the Mothertree Glade in the Elven Village.

name: Book of Darkness
description: A book given by Uruha. The book contains unrecognizable letters written in blood.

name: Debris of Willow
description: Debris obtained from the black willow. Go and seek Uruha while in possession of this.

name: Tag of Rumor
description: This contains rumors regarding Wanderer Dorf and Priest Gerald.

name: Mark of Trust
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Trust. An occupation change related item.

name: Letter to Elf
description: A letter requesting the trust of the Elves. Deliver this to Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village.

name: Letter to Darkelf
description: A letter requesting the trust of the Dark Elves. Deliver this to Tetrarch Thifiell of the Dark Elven Village.

name: Letter to Dwarf
description: A letter requesting the trust of the Dwarves. Deliver this to First Elder Lockirin of the Dwarven Village.

name: Letter to Orc
description: A letter requesting the trust of the Orcs. Deliver this to Paagrio Lord Kakai of the Orc Village.

name: Letter to Seresin
description: A letter given by High Priest Hollint. Deliver this to Cardinal Seresin at the Town of Oren.

name: Scroll of Darkelf Trust
description: A scroll given by Tetrarch Thifiell. Deliver this, along with the Scroll of the Elven Trust, to High Priest Hollint.

name: Scroll of Elf Trust
description: This item can be obtained from Hierarch Asterios. Give this item along with Scroll of Dark Elf Trust to High Priest Hollint.

name: Scroll of Dwarf Trust
description: A scroll given by First Elder Lockirin. Deliver this, along with the Scroll of the Orcs' Trust, to Cardinal Seresin.

name: Scroll of Orc Trust
description: A scroll given by Kakai The Lord of Flame. Deliver this, along with the Scroll of the Dwarven Trust, to Cardinal Seresin.

name: Recommendation of Hollin
description: Deliver this to High Priest Biotin at the Temple of Einhasad on Talking Island.

name: Order of Ozzy
description: Slay Luel of Zephyr and Aktea of the Woods and bring back proof of their deaths.

name: Breath of Winds
description: Obtained from Luel of Zephyr. Deliver this, along with the Seed of Verdure to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Seed of Verdure
description: A proof obtained from Aktea of the Woods. Deliver this, along with the Breath of Winds, to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Letter of Thifiell
description: Deliver this to Magister Clayton of the Dark Elven Guild at Dion Castle Town.

name: Blood of Guardian Basilisk
description: This item can be obtained from a guardian basilisk. Collect 10 of them and create basilisk Plasma.

name: Giant Aphid
description: This may be obtained from various soldier ants. Gather 10 to create the Honey Dew.

name: Stakatos Fluids
description: This may be obtained from various marsh stakatos. Gather 10 to create Stakato Ichor.

name: Basilisk Plasma
description: Take this, along with the Honey Dew and Stakato Ichor, to Magister Clayton.

name: Honey Dew
description: Take this, along with the Basilisk Plasma and Stakato Ichor, to Magister Clayton.

name: Stakato Ichor
description: Take this, along with the Honey Dew and Basilisk Plasma, to Magister Clayton.

name: Order of Clayton
description: Obtain Basilisk Plasma, Stakato Ichor, and Honey Dew and deliver them to Magister Clayton.

name: Parasite of Lota
description: This may be obtained from the wyndsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to Seer Manakia.

name: Letter to Manakia
description: A letter received from Paagrio Lord Kakai. Deliver this to Seer Manakia of Giran Castle Town.

name: Letter of Manakia
description: A letter received from Seer Manakia. Deliver this to Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Letter to Nikola
description: A letter received from First Elder Lockirin. Deliver this to Maestro Nikola of the Cruma Tower.

name: Order of Nikola
description: Obtain 10 Porta Heartstones and take them to Maestro Nichola.

name: Heart of Porta
description: This may be obtained from a porta. Gather 10 of these and take them to Maestro Nikola.

name: Mark of Duelist
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Duelist. An item for occupational change.

name: Order Gludio
description: Defeat both the puncher and the noble ant leader 10 or more times in the lands of Gludio.

name: Order Dion
description: Defeat both the marsh stakato drone and dead seeker 10 or more times in the lands of Dion.

name: Order Giran
description: In Giran, slay a Breka orc overlord and fettered soul ten or more times each.

name: Order Oren
description: Defeat both the Leto Lizardman Chief and tempered monster eye 10 or more times in the lands of Oren.

name: Order Aden
description: Defeat the Tamrin Orc and Tamrin Orc Archer 10 or more times in the lands of Aden.

name: Puncher's Shard
description: A shard of the broken puncher. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Noble Ant's Feeler
description: The feelers of the Noble Ant Leader. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Drone's Chitin
description: The chitin of the marsh stakato drone. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Dead Seeker Fang
description: The fangs of the Dead Seeker bat. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Overlord Necklace
description: Collect ten Breka orc overlord’s necklaces and take them to Duelist Kaien.

name: Fettered Soul's Chain
description: The chains that surround a crimson bind’s body. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Chief's Amulet
description: The amulet of a Leto Lizardman Chief. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Tempered Eye Meat
description: The flesh of a Tempered Eye. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Tamrin Orc's Ring
description: The ring of a Tamrin Orc. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Tamrin Orc's Arrow
description: The arrows of a Tamrin Orc Archer. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Final Order
description: Defeat the excuro and krator of the Cruma Tower, the grandis of Giran, the Timak Orc Overlord of Oren, and the rakin of Aden 3 times.

name: Excuro's Skin
description: The skin of the excuro. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Krator's Shard
description: The shard of a broken krator. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Grandi's Skin
description: The skin of a grandis. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Timak Orc's Belt
description: The belt of a Timak Orc Overlord. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Rakin's Mace
description: Mace used by a rakin. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Luther's Letter
description: A letter given by Master Luther. Take this to Alex of the Village of Floran.

name: Alex's Warrant
description: A warrant written by Alex. Take this to Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's Order1
description: A list of orders given by Leirynn. "Slay 10 Delu Shamans and bring back tokens."

name: Delu Totem
description: The totem of Shaman Saska. Take this, along with the rest of the Delu Shamans’ totems, to Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's Order2
description: A list of orders given by Leirynn. Slay Delu Chief Kalkis and bring back proof.

name: Chief Kalki's Fang
description: Proof that the Delu Chief Kalkis has been slain. Take this to Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's Report
description: A report issued by Leirynn. Take this to Alex.

name: Strange Map
description: A strange map obtained from the Delu chief Kalkis.

name: Lambert's Map
description: A map where the name of Lambert, the former Lord's guard, is written.

name: Alex's Letter
description: A letter given by Alex. Take this and go to Drunkard Borys at Gludio Castle Town.

name: Alex's Order
description: Alex’s orders. The orders give instructions to find and recover Duke Ashton’s missing gold.

name: Wine Catalog
description: A list of premium wine published by the Giran Traders' Guild. Show this to Trader Tweety.

name: Tyra's Contract
description: The contract that Trader Tweety has drawn up. The contract states that Tweety will trade 10 pouches of Red Spore Dusts for a Malrukian Wine.

name: Red Spore Dust
description: Red Spore Dust obtained by slaying the giant fungus. Gather 10 pouches and bring them to Trader Tweety.

name: Malrukian Wine
description: Premium wine crafted following the methods of the Malruk tribe. Take this to Drunkard Borys.

name: Old Order
description: An old order received from Drunkard Borys. Take this and go to Bodyguard Jax.

name: Jax's Diary
description: A diary that Bodyguard Jax has given, saying that it will aid in the search for Solt's and Makel’s maps.

name: Torn Map Piece1
description: A piece of the map that belonged to the former Lord’s guard Solt. Gather 4 of these.

name: Torn Map Piece2
description: A piece of the map that belonged to the former Lord’s guard Makel. Gather 4 of these.

name: Solt's Map
description: A map where the name of the former Lord’s guard Solt is written.

name: Makel's Map
description: A map where the name of the former Lord’s guard Makel is written.

name: Combined Map
description: Using the map of Aden find the hiding place of the Lord's gold bar.

name: Rusted Key1
description: A rusty copper key discovered while digging under the tree indicated on the map.

name: Gold Bar
description: A gold bar stamped with Duke Ashton’s seal. Take this to Alex.

name: Alex's Recommend
description: A recommendation written by Alex. Take this to Master Luther.

name: Mark of Searcher
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Searcher. An occupation change related item.

name: Report of Perrin
description: Take this report and go seek Perrin in Gludin Harbor.

name: Cristina's Letter
description: A letter given by Saintess Kristina. Deliver this to Master Sorius.

name: Picture of Windy
description: A picture of Windy. Take this drawing to Windy.

name: Golden Statue
description: The reward given by the head of the orphanage. Something good happens if this is in possession?

name: Windy's Pebbles
description: A pebble that Windy has picked up from the Wastelands. Take this to Goop, the head of the orphanage near Gludio.

name: Order of Sorius
description: Take these orders and show them to Daurin, who is located west of the Orc Barracks.

name: Secret Letter1
description: The documents of Leto Lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saintess Kristina.

name: Secret Letter2
description: The documents of Leto Lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saintess Kristina.

name: Secret Letter3
description: The documents of Leto Lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saintess Kristina.

name: Secret Letter4
description: The documents of Leto Lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saintess Kristina.

name: Mark of Healer
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Healer. An occupation change related item.

name: Mark of Reformer
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Reformer. An occupation change related item.

name: Book of Reform
description: A book received from Priestess Rupino. Go to the Execution Ground and slay the nameless undeads with the Power of Light.

name: Letter of Introduction
description: A letter of introduction given by Priestess Ruipino. Take this and go to Preacher Sla of the Wastelands.

name: Sla's Letter
description: A letter given by Sla. Take this to Katari, who is near the waterfalls of the Neutral Zone.

name: Greetings
description: A letter sent by Sla to his disciples. Go to the Orc Village, Dwarven Village, and Talking Island in this order.

name: Ol Mahum's Money
description: Ol Mahum currency given by the themselves as a reward. For what...? Nobody knows.

name: Katari's Letter
description: Katari's reply letter to Sla. Collect three reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Sla.

name: Nyakuri's Letter
description: Nyakuri's reply letter to Sla. Collect three reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Sla.

name: Undead List
description: Skeleton archer, skeleton scout, skeleton sniper, thrill seeker, silent horror

name: Ramus's Letter
description: A reply letter sent by Ramus to Sla. Deliver this to Sla after meeting all of Sla’s disciples.

name: Ripped Diary
description: Diaries containing the final words of young women unfairly killed during the witch hunts of Duke Byron Ashton. Collect seven of them.

name: Huge Nail
description: The large nail that was embedded in Aruraune’s skull. Take this to Priestess Rupino at Giran Castle Town.

name: Letter of Betrayer
description: A letter given by an Ol Mahum Betrayer. Take it to Katari who is located in the swamp area of the Dark Forest.

name: Bone Fragment4
description: Bone pieces of a silent horror. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment5
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton scout. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment6
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton sniper. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment7
description: A bone fragment from a misery skeleton.  Take it along with other bone fragments of the undead to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment8
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton archer. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment9
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Mark of Magus
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Magus. An item for occupational change.

name: Rukal's Letter
description: A letter sent by Bard Rukal to Parina of the Village of Gludin.

name: Parina's Letter
description: A letter sent by Parina to the Sage Kasian. The letter makes inquiries regarding the Singing Flower.

name: Lilac Charm
description: A protection charm created by the Sage Kasian. Take this and seek out 3 types of Singing Flowers.

name: Golden Seed1
description: The seed of the Singing Flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal.

name: Golden Seed2
description: The seed of the Singing Flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal.

name: Golden Seed3
description: The seed of the Singing Flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal.

name: Score of Elements
description: A music score sheet given by Bard Rukal. Take this and find the 4 Elemental Tones.

name: Dazzling Drop
description: A dazzling, tear-shaped jewel. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Water Undine.

name: Flame Crystal
description: A crystal obtained from the ghost fire. Gather 5 of these and take them to the Flame Salamander.

name: Harpy's Feather
description: The feather of a slain harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph.

name: Wyrm's Wingbone
description: The wingbone of a slain wyrm. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph.

name: Windsus Mane
description: The mane of a slain windsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph.

name: En Monster Eye Shell
description: The skin of a slain tempered eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake.

name: En Stonegolem Powder
description: Stone powder obtained after slaying the enhanced stone golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake.

name: En Irongolem Scrap
description: A fragment of a destroyed enhanced iron golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake.

name: Tone of Water
description: One of the notes that comprise the beautiful harmony of the 4 elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal of Dion Castle Town.

name: Tone of Fire
description: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal of Dion Castle Town.

name: Tone of Wind
description: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal of Dion Castle Town.

name: Tone of Earth
description: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal of Dion Castle Town.

name: Salamander Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Flame Salamander. It promises to give the Tone of Fire in return for 5 Flame Crystals.

name: Sylph Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Wind Sylph. It promises to give the Tone of Wind in return for materials gathered from the harpy, wyrm, and windsus.

name: Undine Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Water Undine. It promises to give the Tone of Water in return for 20 Dazzling Drops.

name: Serpent Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Earth Snake. It promises to give the Tone of Earth in return for slaying the enchanted monsters in the surroundings of the Ivory Tower.

name: Recommendation of Balanki
description: A recommendation given by Elder Balanki. Gather all 3 recommendations and visit First Elder Lockirin.

name: Recommendation of Filaur
description: A recommendation given by Elder Filaur. Gather all 3 recommendations and go to First Elder Lockirin.

name: Recommendation of Arin
description: A recommendation given by Elder Arin. Gather all 3 recommendations and go to First Elder Lockirin.

name: Mark of Maestro
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Maestro. An occupation change related item.

name: Letter of Solder Detachment
description: A letter from General Kroto that promises to send soldiers. Deliver this to First Elder Lockirin.

name: Paint of Kamuru
description: A painting of Kamuru. Go to the Cave of Trials in the Orc Kingdom to seek him out.

name: Necklace of Kamuru
description: A necklace worn by Kamuru. Deliver this to General Kroto.

name: Paint of Teleport Device
description: A drawing of a teleport device. Recover this device from Master Toma.

name: Teleport Device
description: A teleport device given by Master Toma. Deliver this to Elder Arin.

name: Architecture of Kruma
description: A simple explanation of Cruman architecture. Take this to the research team stationed at the entrance of the Cruma Tower.

name: Report of Kruma
description: A report recording the results of investigations made by the Cruma reasearch team. Deliver this to Eldar Filaur.

name: Ingredients of Antidote
description: Gather 10 Weird Bee Needles, 10 Marsh Spider Webs, and 10 Leech Bloods and deliver them to Researcher Loraine.

name: Stinger Wasp Needle
description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Loraine.

name: Marsh Spider's Web
description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Loraine.

name: Blood of Leech
description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Loraine.

name: Mark of Warspirit
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the War Spirit. An item for occupational change.

name: Vendetta Totem
description: A totem given to the Orcs who seek to punish betrayers of their race. Take this and hunt the Tamlin Orcs.

name: Tamlin Orc Head
description: The head of a slain Tamlin Orc. Gather 13 of these and take them to Seer Somak.

name: Warspirit Totem
description: A totem used in the Ritual of the War Spirit. Take this to Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Orim's Contract
description: I will give you Braki’s remains in return for ten each of Porta Eyes, Excuro Scales, and Mordeo Talons.

name: Porta's Eye
description: A jewel pried from the porta’s eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Excuro's Scale
description: The scales of an excuro. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Mordeos Talon
description: The talons of a mordeo. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Braki's Remains1
description: The remains of Braki, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 3 remains, to Seer Somak.

name: Pekiron's Totem
description: A guardian totem received from Seer Pekiron. Take this and go to the Leto Lizardman Shamans and Chiefs to recover Tonar’s Remains.

name: Tonar's Skull
description: The skull of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Rib Bone
