name: Amulet: Seal of Gloom
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Gloom spell. Used by Overlords.

name: Amulet: Seal of Mirage
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Mirage spell. Used by Overlords.

name: Amulet: Seal of Silence
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Silence spell. Used by Overlords.

name: Amulet: Seal of Scourge
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Scourge spell. Used by Overlords.

name: Amulet: Seal of Suspension
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Suspension spell. Used by Overlords.

name: Amulet: Sight of Paagrio
description: Amulet required for the Sight of Paagrio spell. Used by Overlords.

name: Amulet: Shield of Paagrio
description: Amulet required for the Shield of Paagrio spell. Used by Overlords.

name: Amulet: Steal Essence
description: Amulet required for the Steal Essence spell. Used by Warcryers.

name: Amulet: Freezing Flame
description: Amulet required for the Freezing Flame spell. Used by Warcryers.

name: Amulet: Chant of Fury
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Fury spell. Used by Warcryers.

name: Amulet: Chant of Evasion
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Evasion spell. Used by Warcryers.

name: Amulet: Chant of Rage
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Rage spell. Used by Warcryers.

name: Mark of Guildsman
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Guildsman. An occupation change related item.

name: Valkon's Recommendation
description: A recommendation letter written by Warehouse Keeper Valkon. Take this and go to Blacksmith Allman of Talking Island.

name: Mandragora Berry
description: The fruit of mandragoras, known for their uses in treating ailments.

name: Altran's Instructions
description: Blacksmith Allman’s instructions. The instructions are to gather materials and create 7 Journeyman’s Rings.

name: Altran's Recommend1
description: A recommendation letter written by Blacksmith Allman. Take this and go to Warehouse Keeper Norman of the Village of Gludin.

name: Altran's Recommend2
description: A recommendation letter written by Blacksmith Allman. Take this and go to Blacksmith Pinter of Gludio Castle Town.

name: Norman's Instructions
description: Warehouse Keeper Norman’s instructions. The instructions are to go to Blacksmith Duning of the Hunters’ Village and bring back the key.

name: Norman's Receipt
description: Warehouse Keeper Norman’s receipt. Take this and go to Blacksmith Duning of the Hunter’s Village.

name: Duning's Instructions
description: Blacksmith Duning’s instructions. It gives an order to recover 30 keys from Breka orcs.

name: Duning's Key
description: Mithril key recovered from Breka orcs. Collect 30 and take them to Blacksmith Dunning.

name: Norman's List
description: Ingredient list of Warehouse Keeper Norman: 70 Units of Gray Bone Powder, 70 Granite Whetstones, 70 Units of Red Pigment, and 70 Units of Braided Yarn.

name: Gray Bone Powder
description: The powder collected from the bones of ghouls and strains. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Granite Whetstone
description: A whetstone made from the fragments of the granite golem. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Red Pigment
description: Red pigment obtained by slaying the dead seeker bat. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Braided Yarn
description: Braided yarn obtained by slaying the silenos. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Journeyman Gem
description: A material used to make the Journeyman’s Ring.

name: Pinter's Instructions
description: Instructions of Blacksmith Pinter: Find and bring back 70 amber beads.

name: Amber Bead
description: A bead-shaped piece of amber. Collect 70 of these and take them to Blacksmith Pinter.

name: Amber Lump
description: An unrefined lump of amber. The material used in creating the amber bead.

name: Journeyman Deco Beads
description: Ingredient item that is used to make a journeyman’s ring.

name: Journeyman Ring
description: To pass the Trial of the Guildsman, you must create 7 of these rings. Take the completed rings to Warehouse Keeper Valkon.

name: Mark of Life
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Life. An occupation change related item.

name: Cardien's Letter
description: Letter by Master Cardien. Take this and go to Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village.

name: Camomile Charm
description: A talisman given by Hierarch Asterios. Take this and return to Master Cardien of Dion Castle Town.

name: Hierarch's Letter
description: A letter given by Hierarch Asterios. Take this and go to Thalia, who lives on the eastern shores of Iris Lake.

name: Moonflower Charm
description: The charm given by Hierarch Asterios to keep in possession while searching for the Water of Life.

name: Grail Diagram
description: A diagram of the grail, given by Thalia. Take this and go to Blacksmith Pushkin of Giran Castle Town.

name: Thalia's Letter 1
description: Thalya’s Letter. Take this and go to Arkenia, who is at the Dark Elven Initiation Altar.

name: Thalia's Letter 2
description: Thalia’s letter. Take this and go to Isael Silvershadow of the Hunters’ Village.

name: Thalia's Instructions
description: A letter containing Thalia’s instructions. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

name: Pushkin's List
description: A list given by Blacksmith Pushkin. "10 Pure Mithril Ore, 20 Ant Soldier Acid, 20 Wyrm Talons"

name: Pure Mithril Cup
description: A cup crafted by Blacksmith Pushkin that is made of pure mithril. Take this back to Thalia.

name: Arkenia's Contract
description: A contract written by Arkenia. The contract states that she will give the Stardust in return for Andariel’s Book from the Village of Gludin.

name: Arkenia's Instructions
description: Arkenia’s instructions. The instructions are to bring back Andariel's Book from the Temple of Einhasad in the Village of Gludin.

name: Adonius's list
description: A list given by Priest Adonius: 20 Spider Ichor and 20 Harpy’s Down.

name: Andariel Scripture Copy
description: A copy of Andariel’s Book given by Priest Adonius. Take this back to Arkenia.

name: Stardust
description: The silver dust received from Arkenia of the Dark Elves. Take this back to Thalia.

name: Isael's Instructions
description: A document containing Isael Silvershadow’s instructions. It asks you to recover 6 pieces of talins spear from leto lizardman shamans.

name: Isael's Letter
description: A letter given by Isael Silvershadow. Take this back to Thalia along with the Talin’s Spear.

name: Grail of Purity
description: A grail crafted of pure mithril. Catch the Tears of the Unicorn with the grail and take it back to Thalia.

name: Tears of Unicorn
description: The tears shed by Eva’s unicorn when it is killed with Talin’s Spear. Take this back to Thalia.

name: Water of Life
description: The holy water that contains the powers of life to rejuvenate the Mothertree Glade. Take this and go to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Pure Mithril Ore
description: The ore of pure mithril. Gather 10 of these, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin.

name: Ant Soldier Acid
description: The acid collected from Ant Soldiers after slaying them. Gather 20 bottles of this, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin.

name: Wyrm's Talon1
description: The talons of a wyrm obtained after slaying it. Gather 20 of these, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin .

name: Spider Ichor
description: The ichor of a marsh spider. Gather 20 units of this and take them back to Priest Adonius.

name: Harpy's Down
description: The down feathers obtained after slaying a harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them back to Priest Adonius.

name: Talin's Spear Blade
description: The blade portion of Talin’s Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Spear Shaft
description: The shaft portion of Talin’s Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Ruby
description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin’s Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Aquamarine
description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin’s Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Amethyst
description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin’s Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Peridot
description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin’s Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Mark of Fate
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Fate. An item for occupational change.

name: Kaira's Letter1
description: A letter sent by Magister Kaira to Brother Metheus of the Temple of Einhasad. This must be delivered secretly.

name: Metheus's Funeral Jar
description: A jar for storing the remains of the dead. Take this to the Execution Ground and search for the remains of Metheus’ sister.

name: Kasandra's Remains
description: The remains of Kasandra, Metheus’ sister. Take this back to Brother Metheus.

name: Herbalism Textbook
description: A textbook of various herbs and their usages. It also contains information about the deadly poison belladonna.

name: Ixia's List
description: Medusa’s blood, marsh spider fluids, dead seeker’s dung, tyrant's blood and nightshade root. 10 (units) of each.”

name: Medusa's Ichor
description: The bottled blood of a medusa. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia

name: Marsh Spider Fluids
description: The bottled fluids of a marsh spider. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Dead Seeker Dung
description: The dung of dead seeker bats. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Tyrant's Blood
description: The bottled blood of Tyrant. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Nightshade Root
description: The roots of the rare nightshade herb. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Belladonna
description: A legendary poison that can kill a bull with a single drop. Take this to Brother Metheus.

name: Alder's Skull1
description: The skull of Alders, who drafted the copy of Kaysha’s Revelations. Take this to Magister Kaira.

name: Alders Skull2
description: Skull of Priest Alders. Take it to Magister Roa, a distant descendant of the priest.

name: Alder's Receipt
description: The receipt for the item that Alder entrusted to the warehouse. Take this and go to the warehouse in the Village of Gludin.

name: Revelations Manuscript
description: A copy of Kaysha’s Revelations. Take this to Magister Kaira.

name: Kaira's Instructions
description: A note where Magister Kaira’s instructions are written. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

name: Kaira's Recommendation
description: A recommendation letter written by Magister Aira. Take this and go to Tetrarch Thifiell of the Dark Elven Village.

name: Palus Charm
description: A charm given by Tetrarch Thifiell to keep in possession until the Initiation Ceremony of the Shilien Circle is complete.

name: Thifiel's Letter
description: A letter from Tetrarch Thifiell to Arkenia. Arkenia is at the Dark Elven Initiation Altar.

name: Arkenia's Note
description: A note written by Arkenia. It contains instructions to bring back Red Fairy Dust and Ti-mi-riran Sap.

name: Pixy Garnet
description: A garnet given by the bloody pixy as a mark of promise. Bring back 10 skulls each from four different races.

name: Grandis's Skull
description: The skull of a Grandis. Collect ten of these and take them back to the bloody pixy.

name: Karul Bugbear Skull
description: The skull of a Karul Bugbear. Collect 10 of these and take them back to the bloody pixy.

name: Breka Overlord Skull
description: Skull of a Breka orc overlord. Collect 10 of them and take them to Bloody Pixy.

name: Leto Overlord Skull
description: The skull of a Leto Lizardman Chief. Collect 10 of these and take them back to the bloody pixy.

name: Red Fairy Dust
description: Red Fairy Dust given by the bloody pixy. Take this to Arkenia.

name: Blight Treant Seed
description: A seed given by Ti-mi-riran as a mark of promise. Slay the black willow lurker and bring back its leaf.

name: Black Willow Leaf
description: A leaf obtained by slaying the black willow lurker. Take this to Ti-mi-riran.

name: Blight Treant Sap
description: The sap of Ti-mi-riran. Take this to Arkenia.

name: Arkenia's Letter
description: A letter written by Arkenia. It states that the Initiation Ceremony of the Shilien Circle is complete. Take this to Tetrarch Thifiell.

name: Mark of Glory
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Glory. An item for occupational change.

name: Vokian's Order
description: Collect and bring back 10 of manashen shards, tyrant talons, and guardian basilisk fangs respectively.

name: Manashen Shard
description: A shard of the broken Manashen. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian.

name: Tyrant Talon
description: The talons plucked from a slain Tyrant. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian.

name: Guardian Basilisk Fang
description: The fangs of a slain Guardian Basilisk. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian.

name: Vokian's Order 2
description: Prefect Vokian’s orders. The instructions are to go and seek out the Gandi Chief Chianta in Dion Castle Town.

name: Necklace of Authority
description: A symbol given to those representing Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Chiantas Order1
description: Orders of Gandi Chief Chianta. The instructions are to go and recover the Flame Scepter from the lower Orc tribes.

name: Scepter of Breka
description: Scepter of flame which can be obtained from a Breka orc chief. Take it along with 4 other tribes’ scepters and go see Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Enku
description: The flame scepter received from the Enku Orc Chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Vuku
description: The flame scepter received from the Vuku Orc Chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Turek
description: The flame scepter received from the Turek Orc Chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Tunath
description: The flame scepter received from the Lennunt Orc Chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Chianta's Order2
description: Gandi Chief Chianta’s orders. The instructions are to come back for further orders after reaching level 38.

name: Chianta's Order3
description: Gandi Chief Chianta’s orders. The instructions are to bring back 20 each of Timak and Tamlin Orc heads.

name: Tamlin Orc Skull
description: The head of a Tamlin Orc cut off after being slain. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Timak Orc Head
description: The head of a Timak Orc, cut off after being slain. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter Box
description: A box containing the 5 Flame Scepters recovered from the lesser Orc tribes. Take this to Seer Tanapi of the Orc Village.

name: Pashika's Head
description: Kill Pashika, son of Voltar, cut his head off and show it to Breka Chief Voltar.

name: Vultus' Head
description: Kill Vultus, son of Voltar, cut his head off and show it to Breka Chief Voltar.

name: Glove of Voltar
description: Glove that was thrown out by Breka Chief Voltar. Slay Pashika and Vultus, sons of Voltar.

name: Enku Overlord Head
description: The head of an Enku Overlord, cut off after being slain. Show this to Enku Chief Kepra.

name: Glove of Kepra
description: The glove thrown down by Enku Chief Kepra. Go and slay the Enku Overlords.

name: Makum Bugbear Head
description: The head of a Makum Bugbear Warrior, cut off after being slain. Show this to Turek Chief Burai.

name: Glove of Burai
description: The glove thrown down by Turek Chief Burai. Go and slay the Makum Bugbear Warriors.

name: Manakia's Letter
description: Letter of Seer Manakia. Take it to Breka orc chief.

name: Manakia's Letter2
description: Seer Manakia’s letter. Take this and go to the Enku Orc Chief.

name: Kasman's Letter1
description: Prefect Kasman’s letter. Take this and go to the Vuku Orc Chief.

name: Kasman's Letter2
description: Prefect Kasman’s letter. Take this and go to the Turek Orc Chief.

name: Kasman's Letter3
description: Prefect Kasman’s letter. Take this and go to the Lennunt Orc Chief.

name: Driko's Contract
description: Vuku Chief Driko’s contract. The contract contains instructions to hunt the marsh stakato drones in the Cruma Marshlands.

name: Stakato Drone Husk1
description: The husks of a marsh stakato drone. Collect 30 of these and take them to Vuku Chief Driko.

name: Tanapi's Order1
description: Seer Tanapi’s orders. Hunt the Lennunt Orc Chief and seers and recover the Scepter of Tantos.

name: Scepter of Tantos
description: The Flame Scepter of the now-perished Tantos tribe. Take this to Seer Tanapi.

name: Ritual Box
description: The box containing the scepters recovered from the lower Orcs and the Tantos tribe scepter. Take this to Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Mark of Prosperity
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Prosperity. An occupation change related item.

name: Ring of Testimony1
description: A ring given to those Dwarves attempting the Testimony of Prosperity. Find the 4 Proofs of Prosperity.

name: Ring of Testimony2
description: A ring given to those Dwarves attempting the Testimony of Prosperity. Find Maphr’s Tablet, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry.

name: Old Account Book
description: First Elder Lockirin’s account book. The proof of wealth. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town.

name: Blessed Seed
description: A seed containing the blessings of Maphr. The proof of fertile lands. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town.

name: Emily's Recipe
description: A recipe good for childbirth and childbirth recovery. The proof of fertility. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town.

name: Lilith's Eleven Water
description: Food regarded as the secret to the Elves’ longevity. The proof of health. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town.

name: Maphr Tablet Fragment
description: A fragment of Maphr’s Tablet, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town.

name: Collection License
description: A license that allows the bearer to collect guild contributions. Seek out those who still owe contributions and collect the funds from them.

name: Lockirin's Notice1
description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Elder Spiron.

name: Lockirin's Notice2
description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Elder Valanki.

name: Lockirin's Notice3
description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Elder Keef.

name: Lockirin's Notice4
description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Elder Filaur.

name: Lockirin's Notice5
description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Elder Arin.

name: Contribution of Shari
description: Trader Charly’s guild contribution. Take this to Elder Spiron.

name: Contribution of Mion
description: Trader Mion’s guild contribution. Take this to Elder Valanki.

name: Contribution of Maryse
description: Maryse Redbonnet’s guild contribution. Take this to Elder Valanki.

name: Maryse's Request
description: The note containing Maryse Redbonnet’s request. The instructions are to bring back 100 Animal Skins. Animal Skins are a manufacturing ingredient item.

name: Contribution of Toma
description: Master Toma’s guild contribution. Take this to Elder Keef.

name: Receipt of Bolter
description: Miner Bolter’s contribution receipt. Take this to Elder Arin to confirm if Miner Bolter has already submitted his contribution.

name: Receipt of Contribution1
description: The contribution receipt received from Elder Spiron. Collect 5 receipts and take them to First Elder Lockirin.

name: Receipt of Contribution2
description: The contribution receipt received from Elder Valanki. Collect 5 receipts and take them to First Elder Lockirin.

name: Receipt of Contribution3
description: The contribution receipt received from Elder Keef. Collect 5 receipts and take them to First Elder Lockirin.

name: Receipt of Contribution4
description: The contribution receipt received from Elder Filaur. Collect 5 receipts and take them to First Elder Lockirin.

name: Receipt of Contribution5
description: The contribution receipt received from Elder Arin. Collect 5 receipts and take them to First Elder Lockirin.

name: Procuration of Torocco
description: The bearer of this procuration hereby agrees to submit contributions in place of Torocco. Take this to Elder Keef.

name: Bright's List
description: A list of ingredients that Guard Bright has written. "20 Mandragora Petals, 10 bunches of Crimson Moss"

name: Mandragora Petal
description: The petals of a mandragora flower. Collect 20 of these and take them to Guard Bright.

name: Crimson Moss
description: Crimson Moss obtained from giant red ants. Collect 10 of these and take them to Guard Bright.

name: Mandragora Bouquet
description: A flower bouquet made of Mandragora Petals and Crimson Moss. Take this to Emilly of Dion Castle Town.

name: Parman's Instructions
description: A note containing Warehouse Keeper Parman’s instructions. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

name: Parman's Letter
description: Warehouse Keeper Parman’s letter. Take this to Maestro Nikola of the Cruma Tower.

name: Clay Dough
description: A piece of clay that Maestro Nikola has given. Use this to make a copy of the keyhole from the Titan’s Box.

name: Pattern of Keyhole
description: The keyhole pattern made from the Clay Dough. Take this to Maestro Nikola.

name: Nikolas' List
description: 20 Stakato Shells, 10 Toad Lord Sacs, 10 Spider Thorns and 10 Crystals: D Grade.

name: Stakato Shell
description: The shell of a Marsh Stakato. A key ingredient in making the Titan’s Key.

name: Toad Lord Sac
description: The poison sac removed from the neck of an inpicio. A key ingredient in making the Titan's Key.

name: Spider Thorn
description: A thorn removed from the shell of a swamp spider. A key ingredient in making the Titan's Key.

name: Mark of Champion
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Champion. An item for occupational change.

name: Ascalon's Letter1
description: Veteran Ascalon’s letter. Take this to Mason of Dion Castle Town.

name: Mason's Letter
description: A letter from Mason to Veteran Ascalon of Giran Castle Town.

name: Iron Rose Ring
description: A ring given by Mason. The ring is engraved with the symbol of Iron Rose. Complete the revenge in place of Mason.

name: Ascalon's Letter2
description: Veteran Ascalon’s letter. Take this to Trader Groot of Giran Castle Town.

name: White Rose Insignia
description: An insignia given by Trader Groot. It was formerly worn by the medics of the Iron Rose . Aid Trader Groot in his material gathering.

name: Groot's Letter
description: A letter from Trader Groot to Veteran Ascalon in Giran Castle Town.

name: Ascalon's Letter3
description: Veteran Ascalon’s letter. Take this to Captain Mouen of the Town of Oren.

name: Mouen's Order1
description: Bring back the necks of 100 road scavengers or road collectors.

name: Mouen's Order2
description: Destroy the Leto Lizardmen and bring back 100 of their fangs as proof.

name: Mouen's Letter
description: A letter from Captain Mouen to Veteran Ascalon of Giran Castle Town.

name: Harpy's Egg1
description: An egg obtained after slaying a harpy. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Giran Castle Town.

name: Medusa's Venom1
description: The venom obtained after slaying a medusa. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Giran Castle Town.

name: Windsus Bile1
description: The bile obtained after slaying a windsus. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Giran Castle Town.

name: Bloody Axe Head
description: The head of a Bloody Axe Royal Guard. Collect 100 of these and return to Mason of Dion Castle Town.

name: Road Ratman Head
description: The severed head of a Road Scavenger or Road Collector. Collect 100 of them and take them to Captain Mouen.

name: Leto Lizardman Fang1
description: The fangs of a slain Leto Lizardman. Collect 100 of these and take them to Captain Mouen.

name: Mark of Sagittarius
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Sagittarius. An occupation change related item.

name: Bernard's Introduction
description: Take this letter and go to Sagittarius Hamil of the Village of Floran.

name: Letter of Hamil1
description: Take this letter and go to Sir Aron Tanford of the Southern Wastelands.

name: Letter of Hamil2
description: Take this letter and go to Prefect Vokian of Giran Castle Town.

name: Letter of Hamil3
description: Take this letter and go to Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Hunter's Rune1
description: A stone engraved with a hunter’s rune. Collect 10 of these and take them to Hamil of the Village of Floran.

name: Hunter's Rune2
description: A rune obtained from Breka Orc Overlords or Shamans. Collect 10 of these and take them, along with the Snake Talisman, to Prefect Vokian.

name: Talisman of Kadesh
description: A strange talisman obtained after slaying Kadesh. Take this to Sagittarius Hamil of the Village of Floran.

name: Talisman of Snake
description: Talisman that is related to a serpent totem spirit worshipped by Breka orcs. Take it to Prefect Vokian of Giran Castle Town.

name: Mithril Clip
description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Stakato Chitin
description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: St Bowstring
description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Manashen's Horn
description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Blood of Lizardman
description: The blood shed by Leto Lizardmen. Kadesh appears when enough of this is gathered.

name: Mark of Witchcraft
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of Witchcraft. An occupation change related item.

name: Orim's Diagram
description: A diagram of relics, given by Orim of the Shadow. The 6 jewels needed for opening the Cube of Aklantoth are depicted here.

name: Alexandria's Book
description: A book that contains records on who purchased Aklantoth's Gems. "Master Iker, Magister Kaira, Trader Lara"

name: Iker's List
description: Please bring back 20 each of Dire Wyrm Fangs, Leto Lizardman Charms, and Enchanted Stone Golem Heart Stones.

name: Dire Wyrm Fang
description: The fangs of a slain Dire Wyrm. Collect 20 of these and take them to Master Iker

name: Leto Lizardman Charm
description: A totem obtained after slaying the Leto Lizardman. Collect 20 of these and take them to Master Iker

name: Enchanted Golem Heartstone
description: A crystal found amongst the shattered fragments of an enhanced stone golem. Collect 20 of these and take them to Master Iker

name: Lara's Memo 1
description: Trader Lara’s sales records. It is recorded that a man named Ismel bought the jewel from Lara.

name: Nestle's Memo1
description: Trader Lara’s purchase records. It is recorded that Leopold of the Black Lion brought the jewel.

name: Leopold's Journal1
description: A portion of Leopold’s diary. It is recorded that 3 deserters died and became undead while escaping to the Wastelands.

name: Aklantoth Gem 1
description: Gem that can be obtained from Magister Iker. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth Gem 2
description: The gem given by Magister Kaira. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth Gem 3
description: The gem that can be obtained by killing a nameless revenant. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth Gem 4
description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth Gem 5
description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth Gem 6
description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Brimstone1
description: A mark left behind by the Drevanul Prince Zeruel when escaping from his binds.

name: Orim's Instructions
description: A set of instructions written by Orim of the Shadow. The instructions are to bring back the Sword of Binding and Soul Trap Crystal.

name: Orim's Letter1
description: A letter from Orim of the Shadow to Sir Karol Vasper of the Town of Gludin. The letter asks for the loan of the Sword of the Seal.

name: Orim's Letter2
description: A letter from Orim of the Shadows to Magister Iker of Giran Castle Town. The letter asks for the loan of the Soul-trap Crystal.

name: Sir Vasper's Letter
description: A letter from Sir Karol Vasper to Vadin of the Town of Oren. The letter gives permission for the use of the Sword of Binding.

name: Vadin's Crucifix
description: A holy crucifix of the order, given by Vadin. Take this and go hunt Tamlin Orcs.

name: Tamlin Orc Amulet
description: Amulets that the Tamlin Orcs carry for sorcery purposes. Gather 20 of these and take them to Vadin.

name: Vadin's Sanctions
description: A sanctions letter from Vadin allowing for the use of the Sword of Binding. Take this to Sir Karol Vasper of the Town of Gludin.

name: Iker's Amulet
description: An amulet given by Master Iker. It is said to have powers of protection against evil...

name: Soultrap Crystal
description: A crystal with the power to trap and seal the soul of a monster. Use this to seal the spirit of the Drevanul Zeruel.

name: Purgatory Key
description: A key needed to close Aklantoth’s Chest. Take this to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Zeruel Bind Crystal
description: A crystal that contains the trapped soul of the Drevanul Zeruel. Take this to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Brimstone2
description: A mark left behind by the Drevanul Prince Zeruel while escaping from the body of Fisher Evert.

name: Mark of Summoner
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Summoner. An occupation change related item.

name: Leto Lizardman Amulet
description: An amulet obtained after slaying a Leto Lizardman. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Sac of Redspores
description: Red spores obtained from the bodies of the giant fungus. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Karul Bugbear Totem
description: A totem obtained after slaying the Karul Bugbear. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Shards of Manashen
description: A shard of the shattered Manashen. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Breka Orc Totem
description: A totem that can be obtained after slaying a Breka orc. Collect 30 of them and take them to Trader Lara.

name: Crimson Bloodstone
description: A spirit stone embedded in the body of a crimson bind. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Talons of Tyrant
description: The talon of a slain tyrant of the Wastelands. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Wings of Droneant
description: Wings obtained after slaying Noble Ants at the Ant's Nest. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Tusk of Windsus
description: The tusks of a slain windsus. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Fangs of Wyrm
description: The fangs of a slain wyrm. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Lara's List 1
description: Please gather 30 each of Leto Lizardman Amulets and Sacs of Red Spores.

name: Lara's List 2
description: Please gather 30 each of the Karul Bugbear Totems and Shards of Manashen.

name: Lara's List 3
description: Find and bring back 30 Breka orc totems and 30 crimson bloodstones of fettered soul.

name: Lara's List 4
description: Please gather 30 each of Tyrant Talons and Windsus Tusks.

name: Lara's List 5
description: Please gather 30 each of Noble Ant Wings and Wyrm Fangs.

name: Galatea's Letter
description: A letter from Head Summoner Galatea to Trader Lara at Dion Castle Town.

name: Beginner's Arcana
description: An Arcana card used by apprentice Summoners. You must have this in order to participate in Summoner battles.

name: Almors's Arcana
description: Summoner Almors’ Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

name: Camoniell Arcana
description: Summoner Camoniell’s. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

name: Belthus's Arcana
description: Summoner Belthus’ Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

description: Summoner Celestiel’s Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

name: Brynthea's Arcana
description: Summoner Brynthea’s Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

description: An indication that a Summoner battle has begun.

name: Crystal of Inprogress1
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: Crystal of Foul1
description: An indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Almors.

name: Crystal of Defeat1
description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in battle. Take this to Summoner Almors.

name: Crystal of Victory1
description: An indication that the Summoner has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Almors.

description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: Crystal of Victory2

name: Crystal of Inprogress3
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: Crystal of Foul3

description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Belthus.

name: Crystal of Victory3

name: Crystal of Starting4
description: An indication that a Summoner battle has begun.

name: Crystal of Inprogress4
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: Crystal of Foul4
description: An indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Basillia.

name: Crystal of Defeat4
description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Basillia.

name: Crystal of Victory4
description: An indication that the Summoner has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Basillia.

name: Crystal of Starting5
description: An indication that a Summoner battle has begun.

name: Crystal of Inprogress5
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: Crystal of Foul5
description: An indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Celestiel.

name: Crystal of Defeat5
description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Celestiel.

name: Crystal of Victory5
description: An indication that the Summoner has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Celestiel.

name: Crystal of Starting6
description: An indication that a Summoner battle has begun.

name: Crystal of Inprogress6
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: Crystal of Foul6
description: An indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Brynthea.

description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Brynthea.

name: Crystal of Victory6

name: Mark of Lord
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Lord. An item for occupational change.

name: Ordeal Necklace
description: A necklace given to those who are attempting the Test of the Lord. Go seek 5 Chiefs of different tribes and return with their approvals.

name: Varkee's Charm
description: The Atuba chief Varkees’ talisman. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Tantu's Charm
description: The Neruga chief Tantus’ talisman. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Hato's Charm
description: The Urutu Chief Hatos’ talisman. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Takuna's Charm
description: The Dudamara Chief Takuna’s charm. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Chianta's Charm
description: Gandi Chief Chianta’s charm. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Tantus Charm
description: A document containing Seer Manakia’s orders. It tells you to kill Breka orc shamans and Breka orc overlords and bring back 20 Breka orc fangs.

name: Breka Orc Fang
description: A Breka orc’s fang. Collect 20 of them and take them to Seer Manakia.

name: Manakia's Amulet
description: A mark received after passing Manakia’s test. Take this to Atuba Chief Varkees.

name: Huge Orc Fang
description: The totem of the Atuba tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Sumari's Letter
description: A letter from Blacksmith Sumari to Seer Somak of Dion Castle Town.

name: Urutu Blade
description: A blade crafted by Blacksmith Sumari. Take this to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Timak Orc Skull
description: The skull of a slain Timak Orc. Gather 10 of these and take them to Urutu chief Hatos.

name: Sword Into Skull
description: The totem of the Urutu tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Neruga Axe Blade
description: The blade portion of a ceremonial axe. Take this to Neruga Chief Tantus.

name: Axe of Ceremony
description: The totem of the Neruga tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Marsh Spider Feeler
description: A key ingredient in making the Dudamara tribe totem. Gather 10 of these and take them to Dudamara Chief Takuna.

name: Marsh Spider Feet
description: A key ingredient in making the Dudamara tribe totem. Gather 10 of these and take them to Dudamara Chief Takuna.

name: Handiwork Spider Brooch
description: The totem of the Dudamara tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Cornea of Enchanted Monster Eye
description: A key ingredient in making the Gandi tribe totem. Gather 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Monster Eye Woodcarving
description: The totem of the Gandi tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Bear Fang Necklace
description: The totem of the Hestui tribe. Take this and go to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Martanku's Charm
description: The talisman of the Ancestor Martankus. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Ragna Orc Head
description: The head of a slain Ragna Orc. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus.

name: Ragna Chief Notice
description: “He who destroys the Lord of Flame shall be appointed Chief.” Take this to the ancestral spirit Martankus.

name: Immortal Flame
description: The mark received after passing the Ancestor Martankus’ test. Take this to Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Animal Lover's List
description: Go and seek Gatekeeper Belladonna of Gludio Castle Town, Guard Metty of Dion Castle Town, and Accessory Jeweler Ellie of Giran Castle Town.

name: Animal Slayer's List1
description: Destroy the animal slayers of Talking Island: giant spiders, pokers, and bladers.

name: Animal Slayer's List2
description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Elven Forest: crimson spiders, hook spiders, and the pincer spiders.

name: Animal Slayer's List3
description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Dark Elven Forest: lesser dark horrors, dark horrors, and stoppers.

name: Animal Slayer's List4
description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Indomitable Plateau: kasha spiders, kasha poker spiders, and kasha blade spiders.

name: Animal Slayer's List5
description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Spine Mountains Mining Zone: hunter tarantulas and plunder tarantulas.

name: Bloody Fang
description: A fang dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Bloody Claw
description: A claw dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Bloody Nail
description: A nail dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Bloody Kasha Fang
description: A fang of a kasha dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Bloody Tarantula Nail
description: A nail of a tarantula dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Crystal Brooch
description: A brooch received from Warehouse Keeper Wilfred. Present this to Rylin of the temple at the Village of Talking Island.

name: Spellbook: Greater Heal
description: Amulet required for the Greater Heal spell. Used by Shillien Elders.

name: Spellbook: Greater Battle Heal
description: Amulet required for the Greater Battle Heal spell. Used by Bishops.

name: Spellbook: Greater Group Heal
description: Amulet required for the Greater Group Heal spell. Used by Bishops and Shillien Elders.

name: Spellbook: Remedy
description: Amulet required for the Remedy spell. Used by Paladins.

name: Shining Canine
description: Double-click to wear.

name: Cargo Box
description: Freight box on which the mark of Aden Commercial Guild is stamped.

name: Cargo Box
description: Freight box on which the mark of Aden Commercial Guild is stamped.

name: Cargo Box
description: Freight box on which the mark of Aden Commercial Guild is stamped.

name: Cargo Box
description: Freight box on which the mark of Aden Commercial Guild is stamped.

name: Gludio Apples
description: Apple cultivated in the Gludio region. Can be sold at shops.

name: Dion Corn Meal
description: Powder made from corn cultivated in Dion. Can be sold at shops.

name: Dire Wolf Pelts
description: Tanned leather of dire wolf. Can be sold at shops.

name: Moonstone
description: Jewel of blue and white light called moonjang stone or moonstone. Can be sold at shops.

name: Gludio Wheat Flour
description: Powder made from wheat cultivated in the Gludio region. Can be sold at shops.

name: Spidersilk Rope
description: Strong rope made of weaving tarantula spider silk. Can be sold at shops.

name: Alexandrite
description: Precious jewel that shines green in the sunlight and red in the moonlight. Can be sold at shops.

name: Silver Tea Service
description: High-quality teacup and dish set crafted of silver. Can be sold at shops.

name: Mechanic Golem Spare Parts
description: Accessory used for making or repairing mechanic golems of the Dwarves. Can be sold at shops.

name: Fire Emerald
description: Precious jewel that shines with an intense red light. Can be sold at shops.

name: Avellan Silk Frock
description: High-quality silk dress imported from Avellan of the east. Can be sold at shops.

name: Feriotic Porcelain Urn
description: As a water cup made for their rituals, it is a relic of the ancient Ferios empire. Can be sold at shops.

name: Imperial Diamond
description: Jewel of brilliant light used in decorating the crown of the Elmoreden emperor. Can be sold at shops.

name: Statue of Shilen - Head
description: Part of a broken statue. Can be sold at shops. If you collect the remaining pieces of the statue…?

name: Statue of Shilen - Torso
description: Part of a broken statue. Can be sold at shops. If you collect the remaining pieces of the statue…?

description: Part of a broken statue. Can be sold at shops. If you collect the remaining pieces of the statue…?

description: Part of a broken statue. Can be sold at shops. If you collect the remaining pieces of the statue…?

name: Complete Statue of Shilen
description: Statue of Shilen made in the time of the ancient Elmoreden empire. Can be sold at shops for a high price.

name: Fragment of Ancient Tablet - 1st Piece

description: Fragment of ancient clay tablet. If you collect the remaining pieces of the tablet…?

description: Certificate of royalty but nobody knows who made it.

description: Flute used to call up hatchling of twilight.

name: Kirunas Horn
description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to High Prefect Penatus. You must deliver it quickly.

name: Mithril Mold
description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Blacksmith Rupio. You must deliver it quickly.

name: Bloody Letter
description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Martin. You must deliver it quickly.

name: Supplies to Alex
description: Supply item. It’s really heavy. Let’s take it to Alex in Florin Village.

name: Supplies to Endrigo
description: Supply item. It’s really heavy. Let’s take it to Warden Endrigo at the Execution Ground.

name: Alex's Coins
description: Return gift given by Alex as expression of thanks for having brought enough of the supply item.

name: Wardens Appreciation
description: Letter of thanks given by Warden Endrigo of the Execution Ground as expression of thanks for having brought enough of the supplied items.

name: Blackbox to Orim
description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Orim the Shadow. What could be inside…?

name: Deluxe Windsus Ham
description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Orim the Shadow. What could be inside…?

name: Heart of Silenos
description: Heart obtained by killing silenos. Item specially ordered by Orim the Shadow.

name: Request Giran
description: Order received from the warehouse of Giran Castle Town. You can receive the delivery fee by taking this and the receipt confirmation document.

name: Request Gludin
description: Order received from the warehouse of Gludio Castle Town. You can receive the delivery fee by taking this and the receipt confirmation document.

name: Request Hunters
description: Order received from the warehouse of Hunter Village. You can receive the delivery fee by taking this and the receipt confirmation document.

name: Delivery Score Red
description: Certificate received each time a delivery is completed successfully. If you collect 50 certificates, you can exchange it for a blue delivery statement.

name: Delivery Score Blue
description: Certificate that you can receive if you successfully complete 50 deliveries. The delivery fee increases by 4% for each certificate.

name: Deliverymen Advanced Certificate Super
description: Certificate of master deliveryman received for having successfully completed 1000 deliveries. 120% delivery fee added!

name: Confirmation Document 1St
description: Confirmation form the person receiving delivery of an item signs. Collect three sheets and take it to Warehouse Chief Gesto.

name: Confirmation Document 2Nd
description: Confirmation form the person receiving delivery of an item signs. Collect two sheets and take it to Warehouse Chief Gesto.

name: Delivery Goods 01
description: Scroll to be taken to Sorcerer Baulro of Einhasad Temple on Talking Island.

name: Delivery Goods 02
description: Letter to be taken to Lighthouse Keeper Rockswell of Talking Island.

name: Delivery Goods 03
description: Book to be taken to Marius at the private beach house on the north side of Talking Island.

name: Delivery Goods 04
description: Document to be taken to Matheo at the ruins near the port on Talking Island.

name: Delivery Goods 05
description: Letter to be taken to Sir Collin Windawood in front of the Obelisk of Victory on Talking Island.

name: Delivery Goods 06
description: Shaft to be taken to Orc Guild High Prefect Osborn of Gludin Village.

name: Delivery Goods 07
description: Letter to be taken to Lighthouse Keeper Perrin at the wharf in Gludin Village.

name: Delivery Goods 08
description: Picture to be taken to Wharf Manager Clancy of Gludin Village.

name: Delivery Goods 09
description: Jar to be taken to Sir Karrel Vasper of Gludin Village.

name: Delivery Goods 10

name: Delivery Goods 14

name: Delivery Goods 15
description: Jewelry box to be taken to Pixy Murika in front of the World Tree of Elven Village.

name: Delivery Goods 16
description: Letter to be taken to Karna in Dark Elf Village.

name: Delivery Goods 17
description: Book to be taken to Sorcerer Harne in Dark Elf Village.

name: Delivery Goods 18
description: Statue to be taken to Sir Ortho Lancer in Giran Castle Town.

name: Delivery Goods 19
description: Box to be taken to Martin in Giran Castle Town.

name: Delivery Goods 20
description: Statue to be taken to Bishop Maximillian of Einhasad Temple in Giran Castle Town.

name: Delivery Goods 21
description: Jewelry box to be taken to Master Stapin of Dark Elf Guild in Giran Castle Town.

name: Delivery Goods 22
description: Document to be taken to Master Genwitter at the Warrior Guild in Giran Castle Town.

name: Delivery Goods 23
description: Medicine bottle to be taken to High Prefect Clogg at the Orc Guild in Dion Castle Town.

name: Delivery Goods 24
description: Statue to be taken to Sir Kiel Nighthawk in Dion Castle Town.

name: Delivery Goods 25
description: Mineral to be taken to Blacksmith Poitan at the blacksmith’s shop in Dion Castle Town.

name: Delivery Goods 26
description: Book to be taken to Cardinal Seresin of Einhasad Temple in Oren Castle Town.

name: Delivery Goods 27
description: Scroll to be taken to Duda-Mara Chief Takuna near the Orc Guild in Oren Castle Town.

name: Delivery Goods 28
description: Picture to be taken to Hunter Union Member Colin in Hunter Village.

name: Delivery Goods 29
description: Fabric to be taken to Guard Makhis in Hunter Village.

description: Jar to be taken to Sage Cronos in Hunter Village.

name: Delivery Goods 31
description: Diamond to be taken to Grand Sorcerer Scraide of Magic Guild in Hunter Village.

description: Jewelry box to be taken to Grocer Pano in Floran Village.

name: Delivery Goods 33
description: Gold nuggets to be taken to Alex in Floran Village.

name: Delivery Goods 34
description: Shaft to be taken to Militiaman Leirynn in Floran Village.

name: Delivery Goods 35
description: Letter to be taken to Fisherman Evert in Floran Village.

name: Delivery Goods 36
description: Fabric to be taken to Astrologer Creta in Floran Village.

name: Delivery Goods 37
description: Book to be taken to Sorcerer Kaiena of Dark Elf Guild on the 4th floor of the Ivory Tower.

name: Delivery Goods 38
description: Ore to be taken to Rex in the underground shopping area at the Ivory Tower.

name: Delivery Goods 39
description: Medicine bottle to be taken to Uruha near the waterfall in the north of the marshlands in the Dark Elven region.

name: Delivery Goods 40
description: Small boxes to be taken to Sentry Irene in front of the western bridge of the Neutral Zone.

name: Delivery Goods 41
description: Document to be taken to Sentinel Trionell in front of the eastern bridge of the Neutral Zone.

name: Delivery Goods 42
description: Scroll to be taken to Northwindel in front of the Underground Fortress in the Elven region.

name: Delivery Goods 43
description: Document to be taken to Thalia on the east side of Iris Lake in the Elven region.

name: Delivery Goods 44
description: Box to be taken to Peter of the Turek orc encampment in the south of the Dark Elven autonomous region.

name: Delivery Goods 45
description: Shaft to be taken to Bodyguard Jax on the coastal road in the south of the Wasteland.

name: Delivery Goods 46
description: Key to be taken to Researcher Lorain near the entrance to Cruma Tower.

name: Delivery Goods 47
description: Mechanical device to be taken to Maestro Nikola on the southwest side of Cruma Tower.

name: Delivery Goods 48
description: Document to be taken to Warden Roderik of the Execution Ground.

name: Delivery Goods 49
description: Small boxes to be taken to Summoner Belthus on the southeast side of Cruma Tower.

name: Delivery Goods 50
description: Shaft to be taken to Enku Chief Kepra on the southern coast of Floran Village.

description: Box to be taken to Summoner Celestiel at the ruins of the Circular Coliseum to the south of the Underground Fortress of the Elven autonomous region.

name: Bloody Bee Stinger

description: Special item obtained by killing ghost fire. Item specially ordered by Sorceress Kaiena.

name: Ethereal Blood
description: Ethereal blood received from killing a horror mist ripper. Item specially ordered by Maestro Nikola.

name: Sophia's Order1
description: Order from Chief Mercenary Sophia. Says to destroy the undead at the Execution Ground.

name: Sophia's Order2
description: Order from Chief Mercenary Sophia. Says to destroy ol mahums of the Partisan Hideaway.

name: Sophia's Order3
description: Order from Chief Mercenary Sophia. Says to destroy Delu lizardmen of the southern areas of the Dion and Giran regions.

name: Sophia's Order4
description: Order from Chief Mercenary Sophia. Says to destroy marsh stakatos of the Cruma Marshland.

name: Lion's Claw
description: Mark given to the person that achieves distinguished merits in the Black Lion Mercenaries.

name: Lion's Eye
description: Mark given to the person that achieves very distinguished merits in the Black Lion Mercenaries.

name: Guild Coin
description: Commemorative coin given as thanks by the members of the Aden Commercial Guild.

name: Alchemy Text
description: A book that can be obtained from Alchemist Matild. According to the instructions written in the book, go find the secret keeper tree located in the Cruma Marshlands and obtain the secret book.

name: Secret Book of Potion
description: Ancient book received from the guardian trees of the secret. Take this to Alchemist Matild.

name: Potion Recipe 1
description: Scale of amber basilisk, wind soulstone of whispering wind, glass eye of glass jaguar, blood of Turek bugbear

name: Potion Recipe 2
description: Horn of silenos, ant soldier aphid, tyrant chitin, horror ectoplasm of horror mist ripper

name: Matild's Orb
description: Certificate of friendship from Alchemist Matild.

name: Fobbiden Love Scroll
description: The secrets of depraved but rapturous love are written. May be sold at a high price to an interested person…

name: Amber Scale
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingedients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Wind Soulstone
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingedients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Glass Eye
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingedients to Alchemist Matild.

description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingedients to Alchemist Matild.

description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingedients to Alchemist Matild.

description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingedients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Tyrant's Chitin
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingedients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Bugbear Blood
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingedients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Hunter License 1
description: Certificate that proves eligibility as a 1-circle hunter. You must have this to be able to carry out orders given by the Hunter Guild.

name: Hunter License 2
description: Certificate that proves eligibility as a 2-circle hunter. You must have this to be able to carry out orders given by the Hunter Guild.

name: Laurel Leaf Pin
description: Mark given to hunters that successfully carry out requests of the guild. The more experienced a hunter is, the more of these he or she has.

name: Test Instructions 1
description: Instructions of the test for the 1-circle hunter certificate. Says to complete at least three of the six tasks presented by Grey.

name: Test Instructions 2
description: Instructions of the test for the 2-circle hunter certificate. Says to complete at least three of the six tasks presented by Grey.

name: Cybellin's Request
description: Asks you to raise the purity of blood crystal by killing Leto lizardmen or Harit lizardmen with cybellin dagger.

name: Blood Crystal 1
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 1. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

name: Blood Crystal 2
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 2. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

name: Blood Crystal 3
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 3. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

name: Blood Crystal 4
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 4. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

name: Blood Crystal 5
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 5. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

description: Blood crystal broken by magical inequality.

name: G Basil Scale
description: Scale that was peeled off the corpse of guardian basilisk. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Karut Weed
description: Blade of grass that Leto lizardman shamans use for medication. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Haka's Head
description: Certificate proving that Breka overlord Haka was killed. Take it together with heads of Jaka and Marka to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Jakas' Head
description: Certificate proving that breka overlord jaka was killed. Take it together with heads of haka and marka to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Marka's Head
description: Certificate demonstrating that breka overlord marka was killed. Take it together with heads of haka and jaka to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Windsus Aleph Skin
description: Skin peeled off after killing windsus aleph. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Indigo Runestone
description: Runestone obtained from killing manashen or enchanted stone golem. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Sporesea Seed
description: Spore that comes out of the body of giant fungus. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Timak Orc Totem
description: Small statue that Timak orc fighters carry on their bodies. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Trisalim Silk
description: Strong spider web that comes out of the body of trisalim. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Ambrosius Fruit
description: Tree fruit obtained from killing ti mi kran. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Balefire Crystal
description: Crystal of ill will obtained from killing tairim. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Imperial Arrowhead
description: Arrowhead used by archers of the ancient Elmoreden empire. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Athu's Head
description: Certificate proving that talk raider Athu was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Lanka's Head
description: Certificate proving that talk raider Lanka was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Triska's Head
description: Certificate proving that talk raider Triska was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Motura's Head
description: Certificate proving that talk raider Motura was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Kalath's Head
description: Certificate proving that talk raider Kalath was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Greay.

name: Request 1C 1
description: Kill leto lizardman archer or soldier and get 40 totems of War Hero Kadesh.

name: Request 1C 2
description: Kill timak orc warrior or overlord and get 50 timak jade necklaces.

name: Request 1C 3
description: Kill destroyed enchanted stone golem and collect and bring 50 of the fragments.

name: Request 1C 4
description: Get 30 pieces of giant floating eye.

name: Request 1C 5
description: Kill dire wyrms and collect and bring 40 eggs.

name: Request 1C 6
description: Collect and bring 100 claws of guardian basilisk.

name: Request 1C 7
description: Kill crimson bind and get 50 chains of deadman.

name: Request 1C 8
description: Collect and bring 30 tusks of windsus.

name: Request 1C 9
description: Collect and bring 100 skulls of grandis.

name: Request 1C 10
description: Kill taik orc archer or warrior and collect and bring 50 taik obsidian necklaces.

name: Request 1C 11
description: Bring 30 heads of karul bugbear.

name: Request 1C 12
description: Kill tamlin orc or tamlin orc archer and collect and bring 40 tamlin ivory amulets.

name: Request 1U 1
description: Kill leto chief narak and bring the head.

name: Request 1U 2
description: Collect and bring 50 enchanted gargoyle horns.

name: Request 1U 3
description: Kill breka orc warrior or shaman and get 50 coiled serpent totems.

name: Request 1U 4
description: Kill leto shaman ketz and get demon kadesh totem.

name: Request 1U 5
description: Kill timak raider kaikee and bring the head.

name: Request 1U 6
description: Get and bring 30 kronbe venom sacs.

name: Request 1R 1
description: Kill spore zombie in the Spore Sea and bring 30 amulets of Eva.

name: Request 1R 2
description: Kill grandis chief gok magok and bring back the titan stone tablet.

name: Request 1R 3
description: Kill karul chief oruto and bring back book of shunaiman.

name: Request 2C 1
description: Kill rot tree in the Sea of Spores and gather and bring 40 seeds.

name: Request 2C 2
description: Gather and bring 40 trisalim venom sacs.

name: Request 2C 3
description: Kill taik orc shaman or captain and get 50 taik orc totems.

name: Request 2C 4
description: Kill harit lizardman soldier, archer and warrior and collect and bring 40 harit barbed necklaces.

name: Request 2C 5
description: Kill harit ratman of the National Cemetary, collect 20 coins of the ancient empire and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Request 2C 6
description: Bring 30 farcran leathers.

name: Request 2C 7
description: Kill fline or fline elder and collect and bring 40 tempest shards.

name: Request 2C 8
description: Kill liele or liele elder and collect and bring 40 tsunami shards.

name: Request 2C 9
description: Kill satyr or pan satyr elder and collect and bring 40 manes that were obtained.

name: Request 2C 10
description: Kill forest runner and collect and bring 40 hamadryadesung shards.

name: Request 2C 11
description: Kill vanor silenos soldier, scout or warrior and collect and bring 30 of their manes.

name: Request 2C 12
description: Kill talk bugbear warriors and collect and bring 30 talk bugbear totems.

name: Request 2U 1
description: Kill timak overlord okun and bring the head.

name: Request 2U 2
description: Kill taik overlord kakran and bring the head.

name: Request 2U 3
description: Destroy mirrors of the Forest of Mirrors and collect and bring 40 narcissus soulstones.

name: Request 2U 4
description: Collect and bring 20 diprive eyes.

name: Request 2U 5
description: Bring 20 unicorn horns.

name: Request 2U 6
description: Kill vanor chief kerunos and remove and bring the mane.

name: Request 2R 1
description: Kill grave wanderers and collect and bring 20 skulls of executed persons.

name: Request 2R 2
description: Kill harit chieftain kubel, recover the bust of King Travis and bring it.

name: Request 2R 3
description: Kill judges of marsh and collect and bring 10 swords of bodyguards of King Cadmus.

name: Charm of Kadesh
description: Totem obtained from killing Leto lizarman archers or soldiers. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild.

name: Timak Jade Necklace
description: Necklace obtained from killing Timak orc warrios or warlords. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild.

name: Enchanted Golem Shard
description: Fragment of destroyed enchanted stone golem. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild.

name: G Monster Eye Meat
description: Piece cut for food from the corpse of a giant monster eye. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild.

name: Dire Wyrm Egg
description: Egg obtained from female dire wyrm. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild.

name: Grd Basilisk Talon
description: Claw removed from guardian basilisk corpse. Collect 100 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Revenant's Chains
description: Chain wrapped around the body of crimson bind. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Windsus Tusk
description: Giant tooth of a windsus. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Grandis Skull
description: Skull obtained from killing grandis. Collect 100 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Taik Obsidian Amulet
description: Amulet obtained from killing Taik orc archers or warriors. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Karul Bugbear Head
description: Head cut off after killing Karul bugbears. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Tamlin Ivory Charm
description: Charm obtained from killing Tamlin orcs or Tamlin orc archers. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Fang of Narak
description: Certificate of having killed Leto elder Narak. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: En Gargoyle Horn
description: Horn obtained from destroyed enchanted gargoyle body. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Coiled Serpent Totem
description: Statue obtained from killing Breka orc warriors or shamen. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Totem of Kadesh
description: Statue of demon Kadesh obtained from killing Leto shaman Ketz. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Kaiki's Head
description: Certificate of having killed Timak raider Kaikee. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Kronbe Venom Sac
description: Venom sac obtained from killing kronbe. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Eva's Charm
description: Charm carried on the bodies of ancient Elven warriors. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Titan's Tablet
description: Ancient stone tablet recovered from grandis chief Gok Magok. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Book of Shunaiman
description: Ancient document recovered from Karul chief Orooto. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Rotting Tree Spores
description: Seed collected from rot tree trunks. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Trisalim Venom Sac
description: Venom sac removed from trisalim corpse. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Taik Orc Totem
description: Statue obtained from killing Taik orc shamen or captains. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Harit Barbed Necklace
description: Necklace obtained from killing Harit lizardman soldiers, archers or warriors. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Coin of Old Empire
description: Coin used during the time of the ancient Elmoreden Empire. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Skin of Farcran
description: Skin removed after killing farcran. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Tempest Shard
description: Runestone obtained from killing fline or fline elder. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Tsunami Shard
description: Runestone obtained from killing liele or liele elder. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Satyr Mane
description: Mane obtained from killing satyr or satyr elders. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Hamadryad Shard
description: Runestone obtained from killing forest runner. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Vanor Silenos Mane
description: Mane of vanor silenos soldiers, scouts or warriors. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Talk Bugbear Totem
description: Small statue that talk bugbear warriors carry around on their bodies. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Okun's Head
description: Certificate of having killed timak overlord okun. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Kakran's Head
description: Certificate of having killed taik overlord kakran. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Narcissus's Soulstone
description: Fragment of destroyed mirror. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Deprive Eye
description: Eye obtained from deprive corpse. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Unicorn's Horn
description: Horn obtained from killing unicorn or unicorn elder. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Kerunos's Gold Mane
description: Mane removed after killing vanor chief kerunos. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Skull of Executed
description: Skull obtained from killing grave wanderer. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Bust of Travis
description: Bust of King Travis recovered from hatar chieftain kubel. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Sword of Cadmus
description: Sword of bodyguard of King Cadmus recovered from judge of marsh. Collect 10 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Tor.

name: Coin Diagram
description: Coin book given by Warehouse Keeper Sorint. Show this to Hunter Guild President Bernard and get and bring a coin that looks the same.

name: Kaldis Gold Dragon
description: Coin that is the same as that which Hunter Guild President Bernard has. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Sorint.

name: Cc Membership 1
description: Level 1 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with members of other places.

name: Cc Membership 2
description: Level 2 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with level 2 or level 3 members of other places.

name: Cc Membership 3
description: Level 3 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with level 3 members of other places.

name: Fairy Stone
description: Jewel required to meet and talk with fairy mymyu.

name: Deluxe Fairy Stone
description: Jewel required to meet and talk with fairy mymyu. Be careful because creatures living in Fairy Valley disappear when killed.

name: List of Stuff For Fs
description: “10 pieces of coal, 10 pieces of charcoal, 1 D-grade gemstone, three silver nuggets, 10 backskins of inpicio"

name: List of Stuff For Fsd

description: Egg of drake exarion recovered from leto lizardman warriors.

description: Egg of drake kalibran recovered from road scavengers.

name: Egg of Wyrm Shamhai
description: Egg of wyrm shamhai recovered from deadseekers.

name: Herb of Harit
description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

name: Herb of Vanor

name: Herb of Oel Mahum
description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

name: Athrea's Coin
description: If you collect three Athrea's coins and take them to Witch Athrea, you will be able to obtain Eva's Blood.

name: Symbol of Loyalty
description: Certificate exchanged for life of clan member. Take this to clan leader.

name: Titan's Powerstone
description: This recipe is used in a quest. Needed to create a giant's powerstone. Requires Create Item skill level 2. The success rate is 25%.

name: Mist Drake Egg
description: Egg of mist drake. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martian.

name: Blitz Wyrm Egg
description: Egg of blitz wyrm. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martian.

name: Drake Egg
description: Egg of drake. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martian.

name: Thunder Wyrm Egg
description: Egg of thunder wyrm. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martian.

name: Magipipie Brooch
description: This brooch that was left by a dying Dwarf to be delivered to Head Blacksmith Kusto, his younger brother in Giran Castle Town.

name: Nebulite Crystals
description: Soulshot of unknown identity. The clan leader must collect ten each of this and titan’s powerstones and take it all to Balthazar.

name: Broken Titan's Powerstone
description: Titan’s powerstone. It is broken and useless.

name: Titan's Powerstone
description: Titan’s powerstone. The clan leader must collect ten each of this and nebulite crystals and take it all to Balthazar.

name: Imperial Key
description: Key used when opening imperial coffer. Must have all six to open the coffer.

name: Undead Ash
description: Ash dust remaining after an undead of the Execution Ground is destroyed. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Chief Sophia.

name: Bloody Axe Insignia
description: Insignia obtained from killing ol mahums of the Partisan Hideaway. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Chief Sophia.

name: Delu Lizardman Fang
description: Tooth removed after killing delu lizardman. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Chief Sophia.

name: Stakato Talon
description: Claw cut off after killing marsh stakatos of the Cruma Marshlands. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Chief Sophia.

name: Feather of Gabrielle
description: Mark given by Seal Guardian Gabrielle. Receive recognition for your abilities after taking this and meeting the other guardians.

name: Marsh Stoker Horn
description: The horn that was cut off of a marsh stalker after it was killed. Take it to Magister Kaiena, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Marsh Drake Talons
description: The talons that were removed from a marsh drake after it was killed. Take them to Magister Kaiena, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Kranrot Skin
description: The skin that was removed from a Kranrot after it was killed. Take it to Prefect Chakiris, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Hamrut Leg
description: The leg that was removed from a Hamrut and skinned after it was killed. Take it to Prefect Chakiris, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Remains of Sacrified
description: The remains of a sacrified soul. Take them to High Priest Orven, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Totem of Earthdragon
description: The totem created by Harit lizardmen who worship Antharas. Take it to Master Kendra the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Fragment of Abyss Jewel1
description: A fragment obtained by destroying an abyss jewel in Gludio. Take it to Warehouse Chief Moke, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Fragment of Abyss Jewel2
description: A fragment obtained by destroying an abyss jewel in Oren. Take it to Blacksmith Helton, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Frag of Abyss Jewel3
description: Fragment obtained from destroying abyss jewel. Take this to Watcher of Antharas Theodric at the entrance to the Lair of Antharas.

name: Mara Fang
description: The proof obtained after killing jewel guardian Mara. Take it to Warehouse Chief Moke, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Musfel Fang
description: The proof obtained after killing jewel guardian Musfel. Take it to Blacksmith Helton, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Mark of Watchman
description: Certificate of having been recognized by seal guardian. Return to Gabrielle after receiving certificates from guardians of each region.

name: Portal Stone 1
description: Item needed to activate the teleport crystal that teleports to Lair of Antharas.

name: Gustaf's Letter1
description: A secret letter sent by Sir Gustaf Athebaldt to his aids. Get a hold of it and take it to Martien of Giran Castle Town.

name: Gustaf's Letter2
description: Letter sent by Sir Gustaf Athebaldt to those on his side. Take it to Balthazar of Hunter Village.

name: Gustaf's Letter3
description: Letter sent by Sir Gustaf Athebaldt to those on his side. Take it to Sir Eric Rodemai of Aden Castle Town.

name: Scepter of Judgment
description: Scepter bestowed on Founding Emperor Shunaiman of the ancient Elmore-Aden Empire by the god of light. Certificate representing the emperor’s authority.

name: Proof of Aspiration
description: Item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan to level 5.

name: Black Anvil Coin
description: Commemorative coin given as an expression of gratitude by the Black Anvil Guild.

name: Antidote Recipe List
description: “Herb of vanor, herb of oel mahum, herb of harit, blood of Eva”

name: Voucher of Faith
description: If you take this document to Sir Kristof Rodemai, you can receive the proof of alliance.

name: Proof of Alliance
description: Item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan to level 4.
